00597 BOOLEAN RevealWalls(INT16 sX, INT16 sY, INT16 sRadius)
00598 {
00599 LEVELNODE *pStruct;
00600 INT16 sCountX, sCountY;
00601 UINT32 uiTile;
00602 BOOLEAN fRerender=FALSE;
00603 TILE_ELEMENT *TileElem;
00604 
00605       for(sCountY=sY-sRadius; sCountY < (sY+sRadius+2); sCountY++)
00606             for(sCountX=sX-sRadius; sCountX < (sX+sRadius+2); sCountX++)
00607             {
00608                   uiTile=FASTMAPROWCOLTOPOS(sCountY, sCountX);
00609                   pStruct=gpWorldLevelData[uiTile].pStructHead;
00610 
00611                   while(pStruct!=NULL)
00612                   {
00613                         TileElem = &(gTileDatabase[pStruct->usIndex]);
00614                         switch(TileElem->usWallOrientation)
00615                         {
00616                               case NO_ORIENTATION:
00617                                     break;
00618 
00619                               case INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
00620                               case OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
00621                                     if(sCountX >= sX)
00622                                     {
00623                                           pStruct->uiFlags|=LEVELNODE_REVEAL;
00624                                           fRerender=TRUE;
00625                                     }
00626                                     break;
00627 
00628                               case INSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
00629                               case OUTSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
00630                                     if(sCountY >= sY)
00631                                     {
00632                                           pStruct->uiFlags|=LEVELNODE_REVEAL;
00633                                           fRerender=TRUE;
00634                                     }
00635                                     break;
00636                         }
00637                         pStruct=pStruct->pNext;
00638                   }
00639             }
00640 
00641 /*
00642       if(fRerender)
00643             SetRenderFlags(RENDER_FLAG_FULL);
00644 */
00645 
00646       return(TRUE);
00647 }
00648 
00649 BOOLEAN ConcealWalls(INT16 sX, INT16 sY, INT16 sRadius)
00650 {
00651 LEVELNODE *pStruct;
00652 INT16 sCountX, sCountY;
00653 UINT32 uiTile;
00654 BOOLEAN fRerender=FALSE;
00655 TILE_ELEMENT *TileElem;
00656 
00657 
00658       for(sCountY=sY-sRadius; sCountY < (sY+sRadius+2); sCountY++)
00659             for(sCountX=sX-sRadius; sCountX < (sX+sRadius+2); sCountX++)
00660             {
00661                   uiTile=FASTMAPROWCOLTOPOS(sCountY, sCountX);
00662                   pStruct=gpWorldLevelData[uiTile].pStructHead;
00663 
00664                   while(pStruct!=NULL)
00665                   {
00666                         TileElem = &(gTileDatabase[pStruct->usIndex]);
00667                         switch(TileElem->usWallOrientation)
00668                         {
00669                               case NO_ORIENTATION:
00670                                     break;
00671 
00672                               case INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
00673                               case OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
00674                                     if(sCountX >= sX)
00675                                     {
00676                                           pStruct->uiFlags&=(~LEVELNODE_REVEAL);
00677                                           fRerender=TRUE;
00678                                     }
00679                                     break;
00680 
00681                               case INSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
00682                               case OUTSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
00683                                     if(sCountY >= sY)
00684                                     {
00685                                           pStruct->uiFlags&=(~LEVELNODE_REVEAL);
00686                                           fRerender=TRUE;
00687                                     }
00688                                     break;
00689                         }
00690                         pStruct=pStruct->pNext;
00691                   }
00692             }
00693 
00694 /*
00695       if(fRerender)
00696             SetRenderFlags(RENDER_FLAG_FULL);
00697 */
00698 
00699       return(TRUE);
00700 
00701 }
00702 
00703 void ConcealAllWalls(void)
00704 {
00705 LEVELNODE *pStruct;
00706 UINT32 uiCount;
00707 
00708       for(uiCount=0; uiCount < WORLD_MAX; uiCount++)
00709       {
00710             pStruct=gpWorldLevelData[uiCount].pStructHead;
00711             while(pStruct!=NULL)
00712             {
00713                   pStruct->uiFlags&=(~LEVELNODE_REVEAL);
00714                   pStruct=pStruct->pNext;
00715             }
00716       }
00717 }

00790       BOOLEAN                 fLinkedListDirection=TRUE;
00791       BOOLEAN                 fRenderTile=TRUE;
00792       BOOLEAN                 fMerc=FALSE;
00793       BOOLEAN                 fCheckForRedundency=FALSE;
00794       UINT32                  uiRowFlags;
00795       BOOLEAN                 fDynamic=TRUE;
00796       BOOLEAN                 fEndRenderRow = FALSE;
00797       BOOLEAN                 fEndRenderCol = FALSE;
00798       BOOLEAN                 fPixelate=FALSE;
00799       BOOLEAN                 fMultiZBlitter = FALSE;
00800       BOOLEAN                 fWallTile = FALSE;
00801       BOOLEAN                 fMultiTransShadowZBlitter = FALSE;
00802       INT16                   sMultiTransShadowZBlitterIndex=-1;
00803       BOOLEAN                 fTranslucencyType=FALSE;

00805       BOOLEAN                 fTileInvisible = FALSE;
00806       BOOLEAN                 fConvertTo16=FALSE;
00807       BOOLEAN                 fBlit16=FALSE;

00810       BOOLEAN                 bItemOutline;

00812 
00813       static                  INT32                   iTileMapPos[ 500 ];
00814       UINT32                  uiMapPosIndex;
00815       UINT8                   bBlitClipVal;
00816       INT8                    bItemCount, bVisibleItemCount;
00817       //UINT16                us16BPPIndex;
00818       RenderFXType  RenderingFX;
00819       BOOLEAN                       fCheckForMouseDetections = FALSE;
00820       static                        RenderFXType  RenderFXList[ NUM_RENDER_FX_TYPES ];
00821       BOOLEAN                       fSaveZ;
00822       INT16                         sWorldY;
00823       INT16                         sZOffsetX=-1;
00824       INT16                         sZOffsetY=-1;
00825       BOOLEAN                       fIntensityBlitter;
00826       INT16                               gsForceSoldierZLevel;
00827       ROTTING_CORPSE    *pCorpse=NULL;
00828       BOOLEAN                       fUseTileElem;
00829       UINT32                        uiLevelNodeFlags;
00830       UINT32                        uiTileElemFlags=0;
00831       INT8                          bGlowShadeOffset;
00832       BOOLEAN                       fObscured;
00833       BOOLEAN                       fObscuredBlitter;
00834       INT16                         sModifiedTileHeight;
00835       BOOLEAN                       fDoRow;
00836       INT16                         **pShadeStart;
00837

00839       UINT8                         *pSaveBuf;
00840       ITEM_POOL               *pItemPool = NULL;
00841       BOOLEAN                       fHiddenTile = FALSE;
00842   UINT32        uiAniTileFlags = 0;
00843       INT16                         sZStripIndex;
00844 
00845       //Init some variables
00846       usImageIndex = 0;
00847       sZLevel = 0;
00848       uiDirtyFlags = 0;
00849       pShadeTable = NULL;
00850 
00851       // Begin Render Loop
00852       iAnchorPosX_M = iStartPointX_M;
00853       iAnchorPosY_M = iStartPointY_M;
00854       iAnchorPosX_S = iStartPointX_S;
00855       iAnchorPosY_S = iStartPointY_S;
00856 
00857       if(!(uiFlags&TILES_DIRTY))
00858             pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );
00859 
00860 
00861       if ( uiFlags & TILES_DYNAMIC_CHECKFOR_INT_TILE )
00862       {
00863             if ( ShouldCheckForMouseDetections( ) )
00864             {
00865                   BeginCurInteractiveTileCheck( gubIntTileCheckFlags );
00866                   fCheckForMouseDetections = TRUE;
00867 
00868                   // If we are in edit mode, don't do this...
00869                   if ( gfEditMode )
00870                   {
00871                         fCheckForMouseDetections = FALSE;
00872                   }
00873             }
00874       }
00875 
00876       //if((uiFlags&TILES_TYPE_MASK)==TILES_STATIC_LAND)
00877       GetMouseXY( &sMouseX_M, &sMouseY_M );
00878 
00879       pDirtyBackPtr=NULL;
00880 
00881       if(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags&TRANSLUCENCY_TYPE)
00882             fTranslucencyType=TRUE;
00883 
00884       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < ubNumLevels; cnt++ )
00885       {
00886                   ubLevelNodeStartIndex[ cnt ] = RenderFXStartIndex[ psLevelIDs[ cnt ] ];
00887                   RenderFXList[ cnt ]                              = RenderFX[ psLevelIDs[ cnt ] ];
00888       }
00889 
00890       do
00891       {
00892 
00893             iTempPosX_M = iAnchorPosX_M;
00894             iTempPosY_M = iAnchorPosY_M;
00895             iTempPosX_S = iAnchorPosX_S;
00896             iTempPosY_S = iAnchorPosY_S;
00897             
00898             uiMapPosIndex = 0;
00899 
00900             // Build tile index list
00901             do
00902             {
00903                         iTileMapPos[ uiMapPosIndex ] = FASTMAPROWCOLTOPOS( iTempPosY_M, iTempPosX_M );
00904 
00905                         iTempPosX_S += 40;
00906                         iTempPosX_M ++;
00907                         iTempPosY_M --;
00908                         
00909                         uiMapPosIndex++;
00910 
00911             } while( iTempPosX_S < iEndXS );
00912 
00913 
00914 
00915             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < ubNumLevels; cnt++ )
00916             {
00917 
00918                   uiRowFlags = puiLevels[ cnt ];
00919                   fDoRow             = TRUE;
00920 
00921                   if ( ( uiRowFlags & TILES_ALL_DYNAMICS ) && !( uiLayerUsedFlags & uiRowFlags ) && !( uiFlags & TILES_DYNAMIC_CHECKFOR_INT_TILE ) )
00922                   {
00923                         fDoRow = FALSE;
00924                   }
00925 
00926                   if ( fDoRow )
00927                   {
00928                         iTempPosX_M = iAnchorPosX_M;
00929                         iTempPosY_M = iAnchorPosY_M;
00930                         iTempPosX_S = iAnchorPosX_S;
00931                         iTempPosY_S = iAnchorPosY_S;
00932                   
00933                         fEndRenderRow     = FALSE;
00934                         uiMapPosIndex = 0;
00935 
00936 
00937                         if(bXOddFlag > 0)
00938                               iTempPosX_S += 20;
00939 
00940                         do
00941                         {
00942 
00943                               uiTileIndex = iTileMapPos[ uiMapPosIndex ];
00944                               uiMapPosIndex++;
00945 
00946                               //if ( 0 )
00947                               if ( uiTileIndex < GRIDSIZE   )
00948                               {
00949                                     // OK, we're sreaching through this loop anyway, might as well check for mouse position
00950                                     // over objects...
00951                                     // Experimental!
00952                                     if ( uiFlags & TILES_DYNAMIC_CHECKFOR_INT_TILE )
00953                                     {
00954                                           if ( fCheckForMouseDetections && gpWorldLevelData[uiTileIndex].pStructHead != NULL )
00955                                           {
00956                                                 LogMouseOverInteractiveTile( (INT16)uiTileIndex );
00957                                           }
00958                                     }
00959 
00960                                     if((uiFlags&TILES_MARKED) && !(gpWorldLevelData[uiTileIndex].uiFlags&MAPELEMENT_REDRAW))
00961                                     {
00962                                           pNode=NULL;
00963                                     }
00964                                     else
00965                                     {
00966                                           //pNode = gpWorldLevelData[ uiTileIndex ].pLevelNodes[ RenderFXStartIndex[ psLevelIDs[ cnt ] ] ];
00967                                           //pNode = gpWorldLevelData[ uiTileIndex ].pLevelNodes[ 0 ];
00968                                           //pNode=NULL;                                         
00969                                           pNode = gpWorldLevelData[ uiTileIndex ].pLevelNodes[ ubLevelNodeStartIndex[ cnt ] ];
00970                                     }
00971 
00972                                     bItemCount = 0;
00973                                     bVisibleItemCount = 0;
00974                                     pItemPool  = NULL;
00975 
00976                                     while(pNode!= NULL)
00977                                     {
00978 
00979                                           RenderingFX                               = RenderFXList[ cnt ];
00980 
00981                                           fObscured                                       = RenderingFX.fObscured;
00982                                           fDynamic                                        = RenderingFX.fDynamic;
00983                         
00984                                           fMerc                                                 = RenderingFX.fMerc;
00985                                           fZWrite                                               = RenderingFX.fZWrite;
00986                                           fZBlitter                                       = RenderingFX.fZBlitter;
00987                                           fShadowBlitter                      = RenderingFX.fShadowBlitter;
00988                                           fLinkedListDirection    = RenderingFX.fLinkedListDirection;
00989                                           fCheckForRedundency           = RenderingFX.fCheckForRedundency;
00990                                           fMultiZBlitter                      = RenderingFX.fMultiZBlitter;
00991                                           fConvertTo16                              = RenderingFX.fConvertTo16;
00992                                           fIntensityBlitter             = FALSE;
00993                                           fSaveZ                                                = FALSE;
00994                                           fWallTile                                       = FALSE;
00995                                           gsForceSoldierZLevel    = FALSE;
00996                                           pSoldier                                        = NULL;
00997                                           fUseTileElem                                                = FALSE;
00998                                           fMultiTransShadowZBlitter           = FALSE;
00999                                           fObscuredBlitter                                = FALSE;
01000                                           fTranslucencyType                               = TRUE;
01001               uiAniTileFlags        = 0;
01002                                           sZStripIndex                              = -1;
01003 
01004                                           uiLevelNodeFlags              = pNode->uiFlags;
01005             
01006                                           if ( fCheckForRedundency )
01007                                           {
01008                                                 if ( ( gpWorldLevelData[ uiTileIndex ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REDUNDENT) )
01009                                                 {
01010                                                       // IF WE DONOT WANT TO RE-EVALUATE FIRST
01011                                                       if ( !( gpWorldLevelData[uiTileIndex].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REEVALUATE_REDUNDENCY ) && !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & NOHIDE_REDUNDENCY ) )
01012                                                       {
01013                                                             pNode = NULL;
01014                                                             break;
01015                                                       }
01016                                                 }
01017                                           }
01018 
01019                                           // Force z-buffer blitting for marked tiles ( even ground!)
01020                                           if ( (uiFlags&TILES_MARKED) )
01021                                           {
01022                                                 fZBlitter                                       = TRUE;
01023                                           }
01024 
01025 
01026                                           //Looking up height every time here is alot better than doing it above!
01027                                           sTileHeight=gpWorldLevelData[uiTileIndex].sHeight;
01028 
01029                                           sModifiedTileHeight = ( ( ( sTileHeight / 80 ) - 1 ) * 80 );
01030 
01031                                           if ( sModifiedTileHeight < 0 )
01032                                           {
01033                                                 sModifiedTileHeight = 0;
01034                                           }
01035 
01036 
01037                                           fRenderTile=TRUE;
01038                                           pDirtyBackPtr=NULL;
01039                                           if(uiLevelNodeFlags&LEVELNODE_REVEAL)
01040                                           {
01041                                                 if(!fDynamic)
01042                                                       fRenderTile=FALSE;
01043                                                 else
01044                                                       fPixelate=TRUE;
01045                                           }
01046                                           else
01047                                                 fPixelate=FALSE;
01048 
01049                                           // non-type specific setup
01050                                           sXPos = (INT16)iTempPosX_S;
01051                                           sYPos = (INT16)iTempPosY_S;
01052 
01053 
01054                                           // setup for any tile type except mercs
01055                                           if(!fMerc )
01056                                           {
01057                                                       if ( !( uiLevelNodeFlags & ( LEVELNODE_ROTTINGCORPSE | LEVELNODE_CACHEDANITILE ) ) )
01058                                                       {
01059                                                             if( ( uiLevelNodeFlags & LEVELNODE_REVEALTREES ) )
01060                                                             {
01061                                                                   TileElem = &(gTileDatabase[pNode->usIndex + 2]);
01062                                                             }
01063                                                             else
01064                                                             {
01065                                                                   TileElem = &(gTileDatabase[pNode->usIndex]);
01066                                                             }
01067 
01068                                                             // HANDLE INDEPENDANT-PER-TILE ANIMATIONS ( IE: DOORS, EXPLODING THINGS, ETC )
01069                                                             if ( fDynamic )
01070                                                             {
01071                                                                   if( ( uiLevelNodeFlags & LEVELNODE_ANIMATION ) )
01072                                                                   {
01073                                                                         if ( pNode->sCurrentFrame != -1 )
01074                                                                         {
01075                                                                                     Assert( TileElem->pAnimData != NULL );
01076                                                                                     TileElem = &gTileDatabase[TileElem->pAnimData->pusFrames[pNode->sCurrentFrame]];
01077                                                                         }
01078                                                                   }
01079                                                             }
01080                                                       }
01081 
01082                                                       // Check for best translucency
01083                                                       if ( uiLevelNodeFlags & LEVELNODE_USEBESTTRANSTYPE )
01084                                                       {
01085                                                             fTranslucencyType = FALSE;
01086                                                       }
01087 
01088                                                       if ( ( uiLevelNodeFlags & ( LEVELNODE_ROTTINGCORPSE | LEVELNODE_CACHEDANITILE ) ) )
01089                                                       {
01090                                                             if ( fDynamic )
01091                                                             {
01092                                                                   if( !(uiLevelNodeFlags & ( LEVELNODE_DYNAMIC ) ) && !(uiLevelNodeFlags & LEVELNODE_LASTDYNAMIC)  )
01093                                                                         fRenderTile=FALSE;
01094                                                             }
01095                                                             else if( (uiLevelNodeFlags & ( LEVELNODE_DYNAMIC ) ) )
01096                                                                   fRenderTile=FALSE;
01097                                                       }
01098                                                       else
01099                                                       {
01100                                                             // Set Tile elem flags here!
01101                                                             uiTileElemFlags   = TileElem->uiFlags;
01102                                                             // Set valid tile elem!
01103                                                             fUseTileElem = TRUE;
01104 
01105                                                             if(fDynamic || fPixelate)
01106                                                             {
01107                                                                   if(!fPixelate)
01108                                                                   {
01109                                                                               if(!( uiTileElemFlags & ANIMATED_TILE) && !(uiTileElemFlags & DYNAMIC_TILE) && !(uiLevelNodeFlags & LEVELNODE_DYNAMIC) && !(uiLevelNodeFlags & LEVELNODE_LASTDYNAMIC)  )
01110                                                                                     fRenderTile=FALSE;
01111                                                                               else if(!(uiTileElemFlags&DYNAMIC_TILE) && !(uiLevelNodeFlags&LEVELNODE_DYNAMIC) && !(uiLevelNodeFlags&LEVELNODE_LASTDYNAMIC) )
01112                                                                         //    else if((TileElem->uiFlags&ANIMATED_TILE) )
01113                                                                               {
01114                                                                                     Assert( TileElem->pAnimData != NULL );
01115                                                                                     TileElem = &gTileDatabase[TileElem->pAnimData->pusFrames[TileElem->pAnimData->bCurrentFrame]];
01116                                                                                     uiTileElemFlags = TileElem->uiFlags;
01117                                                                               }
01118                                                                   }
01119 
01120                                                             }

02514                                                                   VarFindFontCenterCoordinates( sXPos, sYPos, 1, 1, TINYFONT1, &sX, &sY, L"%d", pSoldier->ubPlannedUIAPCost );
02515                                                                   mprintf_buffer( pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, TINYFONT1, sX,  sY , L"%d", pSoldier->ubPlannedUIAPCost );

02534                                     {
02535                                           //ATE: Used here in the editor to denote then an area is not in the world
02536 
02537                                           //Kris:  Fixed a couple things here... 
02538                                           //  First, there was a problem with the FRAME_BUFFER already being locked which caused failures,
02539                                           //    and eventual crashes, so if it reaches this code, the buffer needs to be unlocked first, as
02540                                           //  it gets locked and unlocked internally within ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea().  I'm surprised 
02541                                           //    this problem didn't surface a long time ago.  Anyway, it seems that scrolling to the bottom 
02542                                           //    right hand corner of the map, would cause the end of the world to be drawn.  Now, this would 
02543                                           //    only crash on my computer and not Emmons, so this should work.  Also, I changed the color 
02544                                           //    from fluorescent green to black, which is easier on the eyes, and prevent the drawing of the 
02545                                           //    end of the world if it would be drawn on the editor's taskbar.
02546                                           if( iTempPosY_S < INTERFACE_START_Y )
02547                                           {
02548                                                 if(!(uiFlags&TILES_DIRTY))
02549                                                       UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
02550                                                 ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, iTempPosX_S, iTempPosY_S, (INT16)(iTempPosX_S + 40), 
02551                                                       (INT16)( min( iTempPosY_S + 20, INTERFACE_START_Y )), Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 0, 0 ) ) );
02552                                                 if(!(uiFlags&TILES_DIRTY))
02553                                                       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );
02554                                           }
02555                                     }
02556                               }
02557 
02558                               iTempPosX_S += 40;
02559                               iTempPosX_M ++;
02560                               iTempPosY_M --;
02561 
02562                               if ( iTempPosX_S >= iEndXS )
02563                               {
02564                                     fEndRenderRow = TRUE;                                       
02565                               }
02566 
02567                         } while( !fEndRenderRow );
02568 
02569                   }
02570 
02571             }
02572             //    } while( FALSE );
02573 
02574             if ( bXOddFlag > 0 )
02575             {
02576                   iAnchorPosY_M ++;
02577             }
02578             else
02579             {
02580                   iAnchorPosX_M ++;
02581             }
02582 
02583             bXOddFlag = !bXOddFlag;
02584             iAnchorPosY_S += 10;
02585 
02586             if ( iAnchorPosY_S >= iEndYS )
02587             {
02588                   fEndRenderCol = TRUE;
02589             }
02590       }
02591       while( !fEndRenderCol );
02592 
02593       if(!(uiFlags&TILES_DIRTY))
02594             UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
02595 
02596       if ( uiFlags & TILES_DYNAMIC_CHECKFOR_INT_TILE )
02597       {
02598             EndCurInteractiveTileCheck( );
02599       }
02600 
02601 
02602 }
02603 /// kONIE Renderowania klastra
02604 
02605 
02606 void DeleteFromWorld( UINT16 usTileIndex, UINT32 uiRenderTiles, UINT16 usIndex )
02607 {
02608       switch( uiRenderTiles )
02609       {
02610             case TILES_DYNAMIC_LAND:
02611             case TILES_STATIC_LAND:
02612                   RemoveLand( usTileIndex, usIndex );
02613                   break;
02614             case TILES_DYNAMIC_OBJECTS:
02615             case TILES_STATIC_OBJECTS:
02616                   RemoveObject( usTileIndex, usIndex );
02617                   break;
02618             case TILES_STATIC_STRUCTURES:
02619             case TILES_DYNAMIC_STRUCTURES:
02620                   RemoveStruct( usTileIndex, usIndex );
02621                   break;
02622             case TILES_DYNAMIC_ROOF:
02623             case TILES_STATIC_ROOF:
02624                   RemoveRoof( usTileIndex, usIndex );
02625                   break;
02626             case TILES_STATIC_ONROOF:
02627                   RemoveOnRoof( usTileIndex, usIndex );
02628                   break;
02629 
02630             case TILES_DYNAMIC_TOPMOST:
02631             case TILES_STATIC_TOPMOST:
02632                   RemoveTopmost( usTileIndex, usIndex );
02633                   break;
02634 
02635       }
02636 
02637 }
02638

02641 // memcpy's the background to the new scroll position, and renders the missing strip
02642 // via the RenderStaticWorldRect. Dynamic stuff will be updated on the next frame
02643 // by the normal render cycle
02644 void ScrollBackground(UINT32 uiDirection, INT16 sScrollXIncrement, INT16 sScrollYIncrement )
02645 {
02646 
02647       //RestoreBackgroundRects();
02648 
02649       if ( !gfDoVideoScroll )
02650       {
02651             // Clear z-buffer
02652             memset(gpZBuffer, LAND_Z_LEVEL, SCREEN_WIDTH*2* gsVIEWPORT_END_Y );
02653 
02654             RenderStaticWorldRect( gsVIEWPORT_START_X, gsVIEWPORT_START_Y, gsVIEWPORT_END_X, gsVIEWPORT_END_Y, FALSE );
02655 
02656             FreeBackgroundRectType(BGND_FLAG_ANIMATED);
02657       }
02658       else
02659       {
02660             if ( gfRenderScroll == FALSE )
02661             {
02662                   guiScrollDirection   = uiDirection;
02663                   gfScrollStart                        = TRUE;
02664                   gsScrollXIncrement       = 0;
02665                   gsScrollYIncrement       = 0;
02666             }
02667             else
02668             {
02669                   guiScrollDirection   |= uiDirection;
02670                   gfScrollStart = FALSE;
02671 
02672             }
02673 
02674             gfRenderScroll =  TRUE;
02675             gsScrollXIncrement      += sScrollXIncrement;
02676             gsScrollYIncrement      += sScrollYIncrement;
02677       }
02678 
02679 
02680 }           
02681 
02682 // Render routine takes center X, Y and Z coordinate and gets world
02683 // Coordinates for the window from that using the following functions
02684 // For coordinate transformations
02685 
02686 void RenderWorld( )
02687 {
02688 TILE_ELEMENT                              *TileElem;
02689 TILE_ANIMATION_DATA           *pAnimData;
02690 UINT32 cnt = 0;
02691 
02692       gfRenderFullThisFrame = FALSE;
02693 
02694       // If we are testing renderer, set background to pink!
02695       if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & DEBUGCLIFFS )
02696       {
02697             ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, 0, gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y, SCREEN_WIDTH,      gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_END_Y, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 255, 0 ) ) );
02698             SetRenderFlags(RENDER_FLAG_FULL);
02699       }
02700 
02701       if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & SHOW_Z_BUFFER )
02702       {
02703             SetRenderFlags(RENDER_FLAG_FULL);
02704       }
02705 
02706 
02707 //    SetRenderFlags(RENDER_FLAG_FULL);
02708 
02709 
02710 
02711       // FOR NOW< HERE, UPDATE ANIMATED TILES
02712       if ( COUNTERDONE( ANIMATETILES ) )
02713       {
02714             RESETCOUNTER( ANIMATETILES );
02715 
02716             while( cnt < gusNumAnimatedTiles )
02717             {
02718                   TileElem = &(gTileDatabase[ gusAnimatedTiles[ cnt ] ] );
02719 
02720                   pAnimData = TileElem->pAnimData;
02721 
02722                   Assert( pAnimData != NULL );
02723 
02724                   pAnimData->bCurrentFrame++;
02725 
02726                   if ( pAnimData->bCurrentFrame >= pAnimData->ubNumFrames )
02727                               pAnimData->bCurrentFrame = 0;
02728                   cnt++;
02729             }
02730       }
02731 
02732       // HERE, UPDATE GLOW INDEX
02733       if ( COUNTERDONE( GLOW_ENEMYS ) )
02734       {
02735             RESETCOUNTER( GLOW_ENEMYS );
02736 
02737             gsCurrentGlowFrame++;
02738 
02739             if ( gsCurrentGlowFrame == NUM_GLOW_FRAMES )
02740             {
02741                   gsCurrentGlowFrame = 0;
02742             }
02743 
02744             gsCurrentItemGlowFrame++;
02745 
02746             if ( gsCurrentItemGlowFrame == NUM_ITEM_CYCLE_COLORS )
02747             {
02748                   gsCurrentItemGlowFrame = 0;
02749             }
02750 
02751       } 
02752 
02753 
02754       //RenderStaticWorldRect( gsVIEWPORT_START_X, gsVIEWPORT_START_Y, gsVIEWPORT_END_X, gsVIEWPORT_END_Y );
02755       //AddBaseDirtyRect(gsVIEWPORT_START_X, gsVIEWPORT_START_Y, gsVIEWPORT_END_X, gsVIEWPORT_END_Y );
02756       //return;
02757 
02758 
02759 //#if 0
02760 
02761       if(gRenderFlags&RENDER_FLAG_FULL)
02762       {
02763             gfRenderFullThisFrame = TRUE;
02764 
02765             gfTopMessageDirty = TRUE;
02766 
02767             // Dirty the interface...
02768             fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
02769 
02770             // Apply scrolling sets some world variables
02771             ApplyScrolling( gsRenderCenterX, gsRenderCenterY, TRUE, FALSE );
02772             ResetLayerOptimizing();
02773 
02774             if ( (gRenderFlags&RENDER_FLAG_NOZ ) )
02775             {
02776                   RenderStaticWorldRect( gsVIEWPORT_START_X, gsVIEWPORT_START_Y, gsVIEWPORT_END_X, gsVIEWPORT_END_Y, FALSE );
02777 
02778             }
02779             else
02780             {
02781                   RenderStaticWorld();
02782 
02783             }
02784 
02785 
02786             if(!(gRenderFlags&RENDER_FLAG_SAVEOFF))
02787                   UpdateSaveBuffer();
02788 
02789 
02790       }
02791       else if(gRenderFlags&RENDER_FLAG_MARKED)
02792       {
02793             ResetLayerOptimizing();
02794             RenderMarkedWorld();
02795             if(!(gRenderFlags&RENDER_FLAG_SAVEOFF))
02796                   UpdateSaveBuffer();
02797             
02798       }
02799 
02800       if ( gfScrollInertia == FALSE || (gRenderFlags&RENDER_FLAG_NOZ ) || (gRenderFlags&RENDER_FLAG_FULL ) || (gRenderFlags&RENDER_FLAG_MARKED ) )
02801       {
02802             RenderDynamicWorld( );
02803 
02804 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
02805 
02806 //    ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( guiSAVEBUFFER, 0, gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_END_Y, BP_SCREEN_WIDTH_CENTERED, SCREEN_HEIGHT, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 16, 8, 0 ) ) );
02807 
02808 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
02809       }
02810 
02811       if ( gfScrollInertia )
02812       { 
02813       EmptyBackgroundRects( );
02814   }
02815       
02816       if( gRenderFlags&RENDER_FLAG_ROOMIDS )
02817       {
02818             RenderRoomInfo( gsStartPointX_M, gsStartPointY_M, gsStartPointX_S, gsStartPointY_S, gsEndXS, gsEndYS );
02819       }
02820 
02821 #ifdef _DEBUG
02822       if( gRenderFlags&RENDER_FLAG_FOVDEBUG )
02823       {
02824             RenderFOVDebugInfo( gsStartPointX_M, gsStartPointY_M, gsStartPointX_S, gsStartPointY_S, gsEndXS, gsEndYS );
02825       }
02826       else if (gfDisplayCoverValues)
02827       {
02828             RenderCoverDebugInfo( gsStartPointX_M, gsStartPointY_M, gsStartPointX_S, gsStartPointY_S, gsEndXS, gsEndYS );
02829       }
02830       else if (gfDisplayGridNoVisibleValues)
02831       {
02832             RenderGridNoVisibleDebugInfo( gsStartPointX_M, gsStartPointY_M, gsStartPointX_S, gsStartPointY_S, gsEndXS, gsEndYS );
02833       }
02834 
02835 #endif
02836 
02837 //#endif
02838 
02839       //RenderStaticWorldRect( gsVIEWPORT_START_X, gsVIEWPORT_START_Y, gsVIEWPORT_END_X, gsVIEWPORT_END_Y );
02840       //AddBaseDirtyRect(gsVIEWPORT_START_X, gsVIEWPORT_START_Y, gsVIEWPORT_END_X, gsVIEWPORT_END_Y );
02841 
02842 
02843       if(gRenderFlags&RENDER_FLAG_MARKED)
02844             ClearMarkedTiles();
02845 
02846       if ( gRenderFlags&RENDER_FLAG_CHECKZ && !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & NOHIDE_REDUNDENCY) )
02847       {
02848             ExamineZBufferRect( gsVIEWPORT_START_X, gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y, gsVIEWPORT_END_X, gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_END_Y );
02849       }
02850 
02851 
02852       gRenderFlags&=(~(RENDER_FLAG_FULL|RENDER_FLAG_MARKED|RENDER_FLAG_ROOMIDS|RENDER_FLAG_CHECKZ));
02853 
02854 
02855       if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & SHOW_Z_BUFFER )
02856       {
02857             // COPY Z BUFFER TO FRAME BUFFER
02858             UINT32      uiDestPitchBYTES;
02859             UINT16            *pDestBuf;
02860             UINT32      cnt;
02861             INT16       zVal;
02862 
02863             pDestBuf = (UINT16 *)LockVideoSurface(guiRENDERBUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES);
02864 
02865             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < (UINT32)( SCREEN_WIDTH * SCREEN_HEIGHT ); cnt++ )
02866             {     
02867                   // Get Z value
02868                   zVal = gpZBuffer[ cnt ];
02869                   pDestBuf[cnt] = zVal;
02870             }
02871 
02872             UnLockVideoSurface(guiRENDERBUFFER);
02873       }
02874 
02875 }

02877 // Start with a center X,Y,Z world coordinate and render direction
02878 // Determine WorldIntersectionPoint and the starting block from these
02879 // Then render away!
02880 
02881 //ok tutaj jest renderowane przy przesuwaniu
02882 void RenderStaticWorldRect(INT16 sLeft, INT16 sTop, INT16 sRight, INT16 sBottom, BOOLEAN fDynamicsToo )
02883 {
02884       UINT32            uiLevelFlags[10];
02885       UINT16            sLevelIDs[10];
02886 
02887       // Calculate render starting parameters
02888       CalcRenderParameters( sLeft, sTop, sRight, sBottom );
02889 
02890       memset(gpZBuffer, LAND_Z_LEVEL, 2280 * gsVIEWPORT_END_Y );
02891 
02892 
02893       // Reset layer optimizations
02894       ResetLayerOptimizing( );
02895 //#if 0
02896 
02897       // rendering land
02898       uiLevelFlags[0]         =     TILES_STATIC_LAND;
02899       sLevelIDs   [0]         =     RENDER_STATIC_LAND;
02900       RenderTiles( 0 , gsLStartPointX_M, gsLStartPointY_M, gsLStartPointX_S, gsLStartPointY_S, gsLEndXS, gsLEndYS, 1, uiLevelFlags, sLevelIDs );
02901       
02902       //rendering objects
02903       uiLevelFlags[0]         =     TILES_STATIC_OBJECTS;
02904       sLevelIDs   [0]         =     RENDER_STATIC_OBJECTS;
02905       RenderTiles( 0, gsLStartPointX_M, gsLStartPointY_M, gsLStartPointX_S, gsLStartPointY_S, gsLEndXS, gsLEndYS, 1, uiLevelFlags, sLevelIDs );
02906 
02907       if(gRenderFlags&RENDER_FLAG_SHADOWS )
02908       {
02909             // If we have to we render shadows
02910             uiLevelFlags[0]   =     TILES_STATIC_SHADOWS;
02911             sLevelIDs   [0]   =     RENDER_STATIC_SHADOWS;
02912             RenderTiles( 0, gsLStartPointX_M, gsLStartPointY_M, gsLStartPointX_S, gsLStartPointY_S, gsLEndXS, gsLEndYS, 1, uiLevelFlags , sLevelIDs );
02913       }
02914 
02915       uiLevelFlags[0]         =     TILES_STATIC_STRUCTURES;
02916       sLevelIDs   [0]         =     RENDER_STATIC_STRUCTS;
02917       uiLevelFlags[1]         =     TILES_STATIC_ROOF;
02918       sLevelIDs   [1]         =     RENDER_STATIC_ROOF;
02919       uiLevelFlags[2]         =     TILES_STATIC_ONROOF;
02920       sLevelIDs   [2]         =     RENDER_STATIC_ONROOF;
02921       uiLevelFlags[3]         =     TILES_STATIC_TOPMOST;
02922       sLevelIDs   [3]         =     RENDER_STATIC_TOPMOST;
02923       RenderTiles( 0, gsLStartPointX_M, gsLStartPointY_M, gsLStartPointX_S, gsLStartPointY_S, gsLEndXS, gsLEndYS, 4, uiLevelFlags, sLevelIDs );
02924 
02925       //ATE: Do obsucred layer!
02926       uiLevelFlags[0] = TILES_STATIC_STRUCTURES;
02927       sLevelIDs[0]            = RENDER_STATIC_STRUCTS;
02928       uiLevelFlags[1] = TILES_STATIC_ONROOF;
02929       sLevelIDs[1]            = RENDER_STATIC_ONROOF;
02930       RenderTiles( TILES_OBSCURED,  gsLStartPointX_M, gsLStartPointY_M, gsLStartPointX_S, gsLStartPointY_S, gsLEndXS, gsLEndYS, 2, uiLevelFlags, sLevelIDs );
02931 
02932 
02933       uiLevelFlags[0] = TILES_DYNAMIC_MERCS;
02934       //uiLevelFlags[1] = TILES_DYNAMIC_HIGHMERCS;
02935 
02936       sLevelIDs[0]    = RENDER_DYNAMIC_MERCS;
02937       //sLevelIDs[1]          = RENDER_DYNAMIC_HIGHMERCS;
02938       RenderTiles( 0, gsStartPointX_M, gsStartPointY_M, gsStartPointX_S, gsStartPointY_S, gsEndXS, gsEndYS, 1, uiLevelFlags, sLevelIDs );
02939 
02940 
02941       if ( fDynamicsToo )
02942       {
02943             // DYNAMICS
02944             uiLevelFlags[0] = TILES_DYNAMIC_LAND;
02945             uiLevelFlags[1] = TILES_DYNAMIC_OBJECTS;
02946             uiLevelFlags[2] = TILES_DYNAMIC_SHADOWS;
02947             uiLevelFlags[3] = TILES_DYNAMIC_STRUCT_MERCS;
02948             uiLevelFlags[4] = TILES_DYNAMIC_MERCS;
02949             uiLevelFlags[5] = TILES_DYNAMIC_STRUCTURES;
02950             uiLevelFlags[6] = TILES_DYNAMIC_ROOF;
02951             uiLevelFlags[7] = TILES_DYNAMIC_HIGHMERCS;
02952             uiLevelFlags[8] = TILES_DYNAMIC_ONROOF;
02953             
02954             sLevelIDs[0]    = RENDER_DYNAMIC_LAND;
02955             sLevelIDs[1]    = RENDER_DYNAMIC_OBJECTS;
02956             sLevelIDs[2]    = RENDER_DYNAMIC_SHADOWS;
02957             sLevelIDs[3]    = RENDER_DYNAMIC_STRUCT_MERCS;
02958             sLevelIDs[4]    = RENDER_DYNAMIC_MERCS;
02959             sLevelIDs[5]    = RENDER_DYNAMIC_STRUCTS;
02960             sLevelIDs[6]    = RENDER_DYNAMIC_ROOF;
02961             sLevelIDs[7]    = RENDER_DYNAMIC_HIGHMERCS;
02962             sLevelIDs[8]    = RENDER_DYNAMIC_ONROOF;
02963             RenderTiles( 0, gsLStartPointX_M, gsLStartPointY_M, gsLStartPointX_S, gsLStartPointY_S, gsLEndXS, gsLEndYS, 9, uiLevelFlags , sLevelIDs );
02964 
02965 
02966             SumAddiviveLayerOptimization( );
02967       }
02968 
02969       ResetRenderParameters( );
02970 
02971       if ( !gfDoVideoScroll )
02972       {
02973             //AddBaseDirtyRect(gsVIEWPORT_START_X, gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y, gsVIEWPORT_END_X, gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_END_Y );
02974             AddBaseDirtyRect(sLeft, sTop, sRight, sBottom );
02975       }
02976 
02977 //#endif
02978 }

03089 void RenderDynamicWorld(  )
03090 {
03091       UINT8       ubNumLevels;
03092       UINT32      uiLevelFlags[ 10 ];
03093       UINT16      sLevelIDs[ 10 ];
03094 
03095       CalcRenderParameters( gsVIEWPORT_START_X, gsVIEWPORT_START_Y, gsVIEWPORT_END_X, gsVIEWPORT_END_Y );
03096 
03097       RestoreBackgroundRects();
03098 
03099       if(!gfTagAnimatedTiles)
03100       {
03101             uiLevelFlags[0] = TILES_DYNAMIC_OBJECTS;
03102             uiLevelFlags[1] = TILES_DYNAMIC_SHADOWS;
03103             uiLevelFlags[2] = TILES_DYNAMIC_STRUCT_MERCS;
03104             uiLevelFlags[3] = TILES_DYNAMIC_MERCS;
03105             uiLevelFlags[4] = TILES_DYNAMIC_STRUCTURES;
03106             uiLevelFlags[5] = TILES_DYNAMIC_HIGHMERCS;
03107             uiLevelFlags[6] = TILES_DYNAMIC_ROOF;
03108             uiLevelFlags[7] = TILES_DYNAMIC_ONROOF;
03109             uiLevelFlags[8] = TILES_DYNAMIC_TOPMOST;
03110 
03111             sLevelIDs[0]            = RENDER_DYNAMIC_OBJECTS;
03112             sLevelIDs[1]            = RENDER_DYNAMIC_SHADOWS;
03113             sLevelIDs[2]            = RENDER_DYNAMIC_STRUCT_MERCS;
03114             sLevelIDs[3]            = RENDER_DYNAMIC_MERCS;
03115             sLevelIDs[4]            = RENDER_DYNAMIC_STRUCTS;
03116             sLevelIDs[5]            = RENDER_DYNAMIC_MERCS;
03117             sLevelIDs[6]            = RENDER_DYNAMIC_ROOF;
03118             sLevelIDs[7]            = RENDER_DYNAMIC_ONROOF;
03119             sLevelIDs[8]            = RENDER_DYNAMIC_TOPMOST;
03120 
03121             ubNumLevels = 9;
03122       }
03123       else
03124       {
03125             gfTagAnimatedTiles=FALSE;
03126             //uiLevelFlags[0] = TILES_DYNAMIC_LAND;
03127             uiLevelFlags[0] = TILES_DYNAMIC_OBJECTS;
03128             uiLevelFlags[1] = TILES_DYNAMIC_SHADOWS;
03129             uiLevelFlags[2] = TILES_DYNAMIC_STRUCT_MERCS;
03130             uiLevelFlags[3] = TILES_DYNAMIC_MERCS;
03131             uiLevelFlags[4] = TILES_DYNAMIC_STRUCTURES;
03132             uiLevelFlags[5] = TILES_DYNAMIC_HIGHMERCS;
03133             uiLevelFlags[6] = TILES_DYNAMIC_ROOF;
03134             uiLevelFlags[7] = TILES_DYNAMIC_ONROOF;
03135             uiLevelFlags[8] = TILES_DYNAMIC_TOPMOST;
03136 
03137             //sLevelIDs[0]          = RENDER_DYNAMIC_LAND;
03138             sLevelIDs[0]            = RENDER_DYNAMIC_OBJECTS;
03139             sLevelIDs[1]            = RENDER_DYNAMIC_SHADOWS;
03140             sLevelIDs[2]            = RENDER_DYNAMIC_STRUCT_MERCS;
03141             sLevelIDs[3]            = RENDER_DYNAMIC_MERCS;
03142             sLevelIDs[4]            = RENDER_DYNAMIC_STRUCTS;
03143             sLevelIDs[5]            = RENDER_DYNAMIC_MERCS;
03144             sLevelIDs[6]            = RENDER_DYNAMIC_ROOF;
03145             sLevelIDs[7]            = RENDER_DYNAMIC_ONROOF;
03146             sLevelIDs[8]            = RENDER_DYNAMIC_TOPMOST;
03147 
03148             ubNumLevels = 9;
03149       }
03150       
03151       RenderTiles(TILES_DIRTY, gsStartPointX_M, gsStartPointY_M, gsStartPointX_S, gsStartPointY_S, gsEndXS, gsEndYS, ubNumLevels, uiLevelFlags, sLevelIDs );
03152 
03153       #ifdef JA2EDITOR
03154       if( !gfEditMode && !gfAniEditMode )
03155       #endif
03156       {
03157             RenderTacticalInterface( );
03158       }
03159 
03160       SaveBackgroundRects();
03161       
03162       //uiLevelFlags[0] = TILES_DYNAMIC_LAND;
03163       uiLevelFlags[0] = TILES_DYNAMIC_OBJECTS;
03164       uiLevelFlags[1] = TILES_DYNAMIC_SHADOWS;
03165       uiLevelFlags[2] = TILES_DYNAMIC_STRUCT_MERCS;
03166       uiLevelFlags[3] = TILES_DYNAMIC_MERCS;
03167       uiLevelFlags[4] = TILES_DYNAMIC_STRUCTURES;
03168 
03169       //sLevelIDs[0]    = RENDER_DYNAMIC_LAND;
03170       sLevelIDs[0]    = RENDER_DYNAMIC_OBJECTS;
03171       sLevelIDs[1]    = RENDER_DYNAMIC_SHADOWS;
03172       sLevelIDs[2]    = RENDER_DYNAMIC_STRUCT_MERCS;
03173       sLevelIDs[3]    = RENDER_DYNAMIC_MERCS;
03174       sLevelIDs[4]    = RENDER_DYNAMIC_STRUCTS;
03175 
03176       RenderTiles( 0, gsStartPointX_M, gsStartPointY_M, gsStartPointX_S, gsStartPointY_S, gsEndXS, gsEndYS, 5, uiLevelFlags , sLevelIDs );
03177 
03178 
03179       uiLevelFlags[0] = TILES_DYNAMIC_ROOF;
03180       uiLevelFlags[1] = TILES_DYNAMIC_HIGHMERCS;
03181       uiLevelFlags[2] = TILES_DYNAMIC_ONROOF;
03182

03184       sLevelIDs[1]    = RENDER_DYNAMIC_HIGHMERCS;
03185       sLevelIDs[2]    = RENDER_DYNAMIC_ONROOF;
03186

03188

03190       sLevelIDs[0]    = RENDER_DYNAMIC_TOPMOST;
03191 
03192       // ATE: check here for mouse over structs.....
03193       RenderTiles( TILES_DYNAMIC_CHECKFOR_INT_TILE, gsStartPointX_M, gsStartPointY_M, gsStartPointX_S, gsStartPointY_S, gsEndXS, gsEndYS, 1, uiLevelFlags, sLevelIDs );
03194 
03195       SumAddiviveLayerOptimization( );
03196 
03197       ResetRenderParameters( );
03198 
03199 }

03204 BOOLEAN HandleScrollDirections( UINT32 ScrollFlags, INT16 sScrollXStep, INT16 sScrollYStep, INT16 *psTempRenderCenterX, INT16 *psTempRenderCenterY, BOOLEAN fCheckOnly )
03205 {
03206       BOOLEAN fAGoodMove = FALSE, fMovedPos = FALSE;
03207       INT16       sTempX_W, sTempY_W;
03208       BOOLEAN fUpOK, fLeftOK;
03209       BOOLEAN fDownOK, fRightOK;
03210       INT16       sTempRenderCenterX, sTempRenderCenterY;
03211 
03212       sTempRenderCenterX = sTempRenderCenterY = 0;
03213 
03214       // This checking sequence just validates the values!
03215       if ( ScrollFlags & SCROLL_LEFT )
03216       {
03217             FromScreenToCellCoordinates( (INT16)-sScrollXStep, 0, &sTempX_W, &sTempY_W ); 
03218             sTempRenderCenterX = gsRenderCenterX + sTempX_W;
03219             sTempRenderCenterY = gsRenderCenterY + sTempY_W;                              
03220 
03221             fMovedPos=ApplyScrolling( sTempRenderCenterX, sTempRenderCenterY, FALSE, fCheckOnly );
03222             if ( fMovedPos )
03223             {
03224                   fAGoodMove = TRUE;
03225             }
03226 
03227             if ( !fCheckOnly )
03228             {
03229                   ScrollBackground(SCROLL_LEFT, sScrollXStep, sScrollYStep );
03230             }
03231 
03232       }
03233 
03234       if ( ScrollFlags & SCROLL_RIGHT )
03235       {
03236                   FromScreenToCellCoordinates( sScrollXStep, 0, &sTempX_W, &sTempY_W );
03237                   sTempRenderCenterX = gsRenderCenterX + sTempX_W;
03238                   sTempRenderCenterY = gsRenderCenterY + sTempY_W;                              
03239                   fMovedPos=ApplyScrolling( sTempRenderCenterX, sTempRenderCenterY, FALSE, fCheckOnly );
03240                   if ( fMovedPos )
03241                   {
03242                         fAGoodMove = TRUE;
03243                   }
03244 
03245                   if ( !fCheckOnly )
03246                   {
03247                         ScrollBackground(SCROLL_RIGHT, sScrollXStep, sScrollYStep );
03248                   }
03249       }
03250                   
03251       if ( ScrollFlags & SCROLL_UP )
03252       {
03253                   FromScreenToCellCoordinates( 0, (INT16)-sScrollYStep, &sTempX_W, &sTempY_W );
03254                   sTempRenderCenterX = gsRenderCenterX + sTempX_W;
03255                   sTempRenderCenterY = gsRenderCenterY + sTempY_W;                              
03256                   fMovedPos=ApplyScrolling( sTempRenderCenterX, sTempRenderCenterY, FALSE, fCheckOnly );
03257                   if ( fMovedPos )
03258                   {
03259                         fAGoodMove = TRUE;
03260                   }
03261 
03262                   if ( !fCheckOnly )
03263                   {
03264                         ScrollBackground(SCROLL_UP, sScrollXStep, sScrollYStep );
03265                   }
03266       }
03267 
03268       if ( ScrollFlags & SCROLL_DOWN )
03269       {
03270                   FromScreenToCellCoordinates( 0, sScrollYStep, &sTempX_W, &sTempY_W );
03271                   sTempRenderCenterX = gsRenderCenterX + sTempX_W;
03272                   sTempRenderCenterY = gsRenderCenterY + sTempY_W;                              
03273                   fMovedPos=ApplyScrolling( sTempRenderCenterX, sTempRenderCenterY, FALSE, fCheckOnly );
03274                   if ( fMovedPos )
03275                   {
03276                         fAGoodMove = TRUE;
03277                   }
03278

03280                   {
03281                         ScrollBackground(SCROLL_DOWN, sScrollXStep, sScrollYStep );
03282                   }
03283 
03284       }
03285 
03286       if ( ScrollFlags & SCROLL_UPLEFT )
03287       {
03288                   // Check up
03289                   FromScreenToCellCoordinates( 0, (INT16)-sScrollYStep, &sTempX_W, &sTempY_W );
03290                   sTempRenderCenterX = gsRenderCenterX + sTempX_W;
03291                   sTempRenderCenterY = gsRenderCenterY + sTempY_W;                              
03292                   fUpOK=ApplyScrolling( sTempRenderCenterX, sTempRenderCenterY, FALSE, fCheckOnly );
03293 
03294                   // Check left
03295                   FromScreenToCellCoordinates( (INT16)-sScrollXStep, 0, &sTempX_W, &sTempY_W ); 
03296                   sTempRenderCenterX = gsRenderCenterX + sTempX_W;
03297                   sTempRenderCenterY = gsRenderCenterY + sTempY_W;                              
03298                   fLeftOK=ApplyScrolling( sTempRenderCenterX, sTempRenderCenterY, FALSE, fCheckOnly );
03299 
03300 
03301                   if ( fLeftOK && fUpOK )
03302                   {
03303                         FromScreenToCellCoordinates( (INT16)-sScrollXStep, (INT16)-sScrollYStep, &sTempX_W, &sTempY_W );      
03304                         sTempRenderCenterX = gsRenderCenterX + sTempX_W;
03305                         sTempRenderCenterY = gsRenderCenterY + sTempY_W;                              
03306                         fAGoodMove = TRUE;
03307 
03308                         if ( !fCheckOnly )
03309                         {
03310                               ScrollBackground(SCROLL_UPLEFT, sScrollXStep, sScrollYStep );
03311                         }
03312 
03313                   }
03314                   else if ( fUpOK )
03315                   {
03316                         fAGoodMove = TRUE;
03317 
03318                         FromScreenToCellCoordinates( 0, (INT16)-sScrollYStep, &sTempX_W, &sTempY_W );
03319                         sTempRenderCenterX = gsRenderCenterX + sTempX_W;
03320                         sTempRenderCenterY = gsRenderCenterY + sTempY_W;                              
03321 
03322                         if ( !fCheckOnly )
03323                         {
03324                               ScrollBackground(SCROLL_UP, sScrollXStep, sScrollYStep );
03325                         }
03326 
03327                   }
03328                   else if ( fLeftOK )
03329                   {
03330                         fAGoodMove = TRUE;
03331 
03332                         FromScreenToCellCoordinates( (INT16)-sScrollXStep, 0, &sTempX_W, &sTempY_W ); 
03333                         sTempRenderCenterX = gsRenderCenterX + sTempX_W;
03334                         sTempRenderCenterY = gsRenderCenterY + sTempY_W;                              
03335 
03336                         if ( !fCheckOnly )
03337                         {
03338                               ScrollBackground(SCROLL_LEFT, sScrollXStep, sScrollYStep );
03339                         }
03340                   }
03341       }
03342 
03343       if ( ScrollFlags & SCROLL_UPRIGHT )
03344       {
03345 
03346                   // Check up
03347                   FromScreenToCellCoordinates( 0, (INT16)-sScrollYStep, &sTempX_W, &sTempY_W );
03348                   sTempRenderCenterX = gsRenderCenterX + sTempX_W;
03349                   sTempRenderCenterY = gsRenderCenterY + sTempY_W;

03351

03355                   sTempRenderCenterY = gsRenderCenterY + sTempY_W;

03357

03359                   {
03360                         FromScreenToCellCoordinates( (INT16)sScrollXStep, (INT16)-sScrollYStep, &sTempX_W, &sTempY_W ); 
03361                         sTempRenderCenterX = gsRenderCenterX + sTempX_W;
03362                         sTempRenderCenterY = gsRenderCenterY + sTempY_W;                              
03363                         fAGoodMove = TRUE;
03364 
03365                         if ( !fCheckOnly )
03366                         {
03367                               ScrollBackground(SCROLL_UPRIGHT, sScrollXStep, sScrollYStep );
03368                         }
03369 
03370                   }
03371                   else if ( fUpOK )
03372                   {
03373                         fAGoodMove = TRUE;
03374 
03375                         FromScreenToCellCoordinates( 0, (INT16)-sScrollYStep, &sTempX_W, &sTempY_W );
03376                         sTempRenderCenterX = gsRenderCenterX + sTempX_W;
03377                         sTempRenderCenterY = gsRenderCenterY + sTempY_W;                              
03378 
03379                         if ( !fCheckOnly )
03380                         {
03381                               ScrollBackground(SCROLL_UP, sScrollXStep, sScrollYStep );
03382                         }
03383                   }
03384                   else if ( fRightOK )
03385                   {
03386                         fAGoodMove = TRUE;
03387 
03388                         FromScreenToCellCoordinates( sScrollXStep, 0, &sTempX_W, &sTempY_W );
03389                         sTempRenderCenterX = gsRenderCenterX + sTempX_W;
03390                         sTempRenderCenterY = gsRenderCenterY + sTempY_W;                              
03391 
03392                         if ( !fCheckOnly )
03393                         {
03394                               ScrollBackground(SCROLL_RIGHT, sScrollXStep, sScrollYStep );
03395                         }
03396                   }
03397       }
03398 
03399       if ( ScrollFlags & SCROLL_DOWNLEFT )
03400       {
03401                   // Check down......
03402                   FromScreenToCellCoordinates( 0, sScrollYStep, &sTempX_W, &sTempY_W );
03403                   sTempRenderCenterX = gsRenderCenterX + sTempX_W;
03404                   sTempRenderCenterY = gsRenderCenterY + sTempY_W;                              
03405                   fDownOK=ApplyScrolling( sTempRenderCenterX, sTempRenderCenterY, FALSE, fCheckOnly );
03406 
03407                   // Check left.....
03408                   FromScreenToCellCoordinates( (INT16)-sScrollXStep, 0, &sTempX_W, &sTempY_W ); 
03409                   sTempRenderCenterX = gsRenderCenterX + sTempX_W;
03410                   sTempRenderCenterY = gsRenderCenterY + sTempY_W;                              
03411                   fLeftOK=ApplyScrolling( sTempRenderCenterX, sTempRenderCenterY, FALSE, fCheckOnly );
03412 
03413                   if ( fLeftOK && fDownOK )
03414                   {
03415                         fAGoodMove = TRUE;
03416                         FromScreenToCellCoordinates( (INT16)-sScrollXStep, (INT16)sScrollYStep, &sTempX_W, &sTempY_W ); 
03417                         sTempRenderCenterX = gsRenderCenterX + sTempX_W;
03418                         sTempRenderCenterY = gsRenderCenterY + sTempY_W;                              
03419 
03420                         if ( !fCheckOnly )
03421                         {
03422                               ScrollBackground(SCROLL_DOWNLEFT, sScrollXStep, sScrollYStep );
03423                         }
03424 
03425                   }
03426                   else if ( fLeftOK )
03427                   {
03428                               FromScreenToCellCoordinates( (INT16)-sScrollXStep, 0, &sTempX_W, &sTempY_W ); 
03429                               sTempRenderCenterX = gsRenderCenterX + sTempX_W;
03430                               sTempRenderCenterY = gsRenderCenterY + sTempY_W;                              
03431                               fAGoodMove = TRUE;
03432 
03433                               if ( !fCheckOnly )
03434                               {
03435                                     ScrollBackground(SCROLL_LEFT, sScrollXStep, sScrollYStep );
03436                               }
03437                   }
03438                   else if ( fDownOK )
03439                   {
03440                               FromScreenToCellCoordinates( 0, sScrollYStep, &sTempX_W, &sTempY_W );
03441                               sTempRenderCenterX = gsRenderCenterX + sTempX_W;
03442                               sTempRenderCenterY = gsRenderCenterY + sTempY_W;                              
03443                               fAGoodMove = TRUE;
03444 
03445                               if ( !fCheckOnly )
03446                               {
03447                                     ScrollBackground(SCROLL_DOWN, sScrollXStep, sScrollYStep );
03448                               }
03449                   }
03450       }
03451 
03452       if ( ScrollFlags & SCROLL_DOWNRIGHT )
03453       {
03454                   // Check right
03455                   FromScreenToCellCoordinates( sScrollXStep, 0, &sTempX_W, &sTempY_W );
03456                   sTempRenderCenterX = gsRenderCenterX + sTempX_W;
03457                   sTempRenderCenterY = gsRenderCenterY + sTempY_W;                              
03458                   fRightOK=ApplyScrolling( sTempRenderCenterX, sTempRenderCenterY, FALSE, fCheckOnly );
03459 
03460                   // Check down
03461                   FromScreenToCellCoordinates( 0, sScrollYStep, &sTempX_W, &sTempY_W );
03462                   sTempRenderCenterX = gsRenderCenterX + sTempX_W;
03463                   sTempRenderCenterY = gsRenderCenterY + sTempY_W;                              
03464                   fDownOK=ApplyScrolling( sTempRenderCenterX, sTempRenderCenterY, FALSE, fCheckOnly );
03465 
03466                   if ( fDownOK && fRightOK )
03467                   {
03468                         FromScreenToCellCoordinates( (INT16)sScrollXStep, (INT16)sScrollYStep, &sTempX_W, &sTempY_W );  
03469                         sTempRenderCenterX = gsRenderCenterX + sTempX_W;
03470                         sTempRenderCenterY = gsRenderCenterY + sTempY_W;                              
03471                         fAGoodMove = TRUE;
03472 
03473                         if ( !fCheckOnly )
03474                         {
03475                               ScrollBackground( SCROLL_DOWNRIGHT, sScrollXStep, sScrollYStep );
03476                         }
03477 
03478                   }
03479                   else if ( fDownOK )
03480                   {
03481                               FromScreenToCellCoordinates( 0, sScrollYStep, &sTempX_W, &sTempY_W );
03482                               sTempRenderCenterX = gsRenderCenterX + sTempX_W;
03483                               sTempRenderCenterY = gsRenderCenterY + sTempY_W;                              
03484                               fAGoodMove = TRUE;
03485 
03486                               if ( !fCheckOnly )
03487                               {
03488                                     ScrollBackground( SCROLL_DOWN, sScrollXStep, sScrollYStep );
03489                               }
03490                   }
03491                   else if ( fRightOK )
03492                   {
03493                               FromScreenToCellCoordinates( sScrollXStep, 0, &sTempX_W, &sTempY_W );
03494                               sTempRenderCenterX = gsRenderCenterX + sTempX_W;
03495                               sTempRenderCenterY = gsRenderCenterY + sTempY_W;                              
03496                               fAGoodMove = TRUE;
03497 
03498                               if ( !fCheckOnly )
03499                               {
03500                                     ScrollBackground( SCROLL_RIGHT, sScrollXStep, sScrollYStep );
03501                               }
03502                   }
03503 
03504       }
03505 
03506       ( *psTempRenderCenterX ) = sTempRenderCenterX;
03507       ( *psTempRenderCenterY ) = sTempRenderCenterY;
03508 
03509 
03510       return( fAGoodMove );

03512 
03513 extern BOOLEAN gfNextRefreshFullScreen;
03514 
03515 void ScrollWorld( )
03516 {
03517       UINT32            ScrollFlags = 0;
03518       BOOLEAN           fDoScroll = FALSE, fMovedPos=FALSE, fAGoodMove = FALSE;
03519       INT16 sTempRenderCenterX, sTempRenderCenterY;
03520       INT8  bDirection;
03521       INT16 sScrollXStep=-1;
03522       INT16 sScrollYStep=-1;
03523       BOOLEAN           fIgnoreInput      = FALSE;
03524   static    UINT8   ubOldScrollSpeed = 0;
03525   static    BOOLEAN fFirstTimeInSlideToMode = TRUE;
03526 
03527 
03528       if ( gfIgnoreScrollDueToCenterAdjust )
03529       {
03530             //    gfIgnoreScrollDueToCenterAdjust = FALSE;
03531             return;
03532       }
03533 
03534       if ( gfIgnoreScrolling == 1 )
03535       {
03536             return;
03537       }
03538 
03539       if ( gfIgnoreScrolling == 2 )
03540       {
03541             fIgnoreInput = TRUE;
03542       }
03543 
03544       if ( gCurrentUIMode == LOCKUI_MODE )
03545       {
03546             fIgnoreInput = TRUE;
03547       }
03548 
03549 
03550       // If in editor, ignore scrolling if any of the shift keys pressed with arrow keys
03551       if ( gfEditMode && ( _KeyDown(CTRL) || _KeyDown(ALT) ) )
03552             return;
03553 
03554       // Ignore if ALT DONW
03555       if ( _KeyDown( ALT ) )
03556             return;
03557 
03558 
03559       do
03560       {
03561 
03562             if ( gfIgnoreScrolling != 3 )
03563             {
03564                   // Check for sliding
03565                   if ( gTacticalStatus.sSlideTarget != NOWHERE )
03566                   {
03567                          // Ignore all input...
03568                          // Check if we have reached out dest!
03569          if ( fFirstTimeInSlideToMode )
03570          {
03571            ubOldScrollSpeed = gubCurScrollSpeedID;
03572            fFirstTimeInSlideToMode = FALSE;
03573          }
03574 
03575          // Make faster!
03576          //gubCurScrollSpeedID = 2;
03577 
03578                          ScrollFlags = 0;
03579                          fDoScroll = FALSE;
03580                          // 
03581                          if ( SoldierLocationRelativeToScreen( gTacticalStatus.sSlideTarget, gTacticalStatus.sSlideReason, &bDirection, &ScrollFlags ) && GridNoOnVisibleWorldTile( gTacticalStatus.sSlideTarget ) )
03582                          {
03583                                     ScrollFlags = gScrollDirectionFlags[ bDirection ];
03584                                     fDoScroll               = TRUE;
03585                                     fIgnoreInput      = TRUE;
03586                          }
03587                          else
03588                          {
03589                                     // We've stopped!
03590                                     gTacticalStatus.sSlideTarget = NOWHERE;
03591                          }
03592                   }
03593       else
03594       {
03595         // Restore old scroll speed
03596         if ( !fFirstTimeInSlideToMode )
03597         {
03598           gubCurScrollSpeedID = ubOldScrollSpeed;
03599         }
03600         fFirstTimeInSlideToMode = TRUE;
03601       }
03602             }
03603 
03604             if ( !fIgnoreInput )
03605             {
03606                   // Check keys
03607                   if ( _KeyDown( UPARROW )  )
03608                   {
03609                         fDoScroll = TRUE;
03610                         ScrollFlags |= SCROLL_UP;
03611                   }
03612                    
03613 
03614                   if ( _KeyDown( DNARROW )  )
03615                   {
03616                         fDoScroll = TRUE;
03617                         ScrollFlags |= SCROLL_DOWN;
03618                   }
03619 
03620 
03621                   if ( _KeyDown( RIGHTARROW )  )
03622                   {
03623                         fDoScroll = TRUE;
03624                         ScrollFlags |= SCROLL_RIGHT;
03625                   }
03626 
03627 
03628                   if ( _KeyDown( LEFTARROW )  )
03629                   {
03630                         fDoScroll = TRUE;
03631                         ScrollFlags |= SCROLL_LEFT;
03632                   }
03633 
03634       
03635                   // Do mouse - PUT INTO A TIMER!
03636                   // Put a counter on starting from mouse, if we have not started already!
03637                   if ( !gfScrollInertia && gfScrollPending == FALSE )
03638                   {
03639                         if ( !COUNTERDONE( STARTSCROLL ) )
03640                         {
03641                               break;
03642                         }
03643                         RESETCOUNTER( STARTSCROLL );
03644 
03645                   }
03646 
03647                   if ( gusMouseYPos == 0 )
03648                   {
03649                         fDoScroll = TRUE;
03650                         ScrollFlags |= SCROLL_UP;
03651                   }
03652                    
03653 
03654                   if ( gusMouseYPos >= SCREEN_HEIGHT - 1 )
03655                   {
03656                         fDoScroll = TRUE;
03657                         ScrollFlags |= SCROLL_DOWN;
03658                   }
03659 
03660 
03661                   if ( gusMouseXPos >= SCREEN_WIDTH - 1 )
03662                   {
03663                         fDoScroll = TRUE;
03664                         ScrollFlags |= SCROLL_RIGHT;
03665                   }
03666 
03667 
03668                   if ( gusMouseXPos == 0 )
03669                   {
03670                         fDoScroll = TRUE;
03671                         ScrollFlags |= SCROLL_LEFT;
03672                   }
03673             }
03674 
03675       } while( FALSE );
03676 
03677 
03678       if ( fDoScroll )
03679       {
03680                   if ( gfDoSubtileScroll )
03681                   {
03682                         if ( gfScrollInertia > gubNewScrollIDSpeeds[ gubCurScrollSpeedID ] )
03683                         {
03684                               gubCurScrollSpeedID++;
03685 
03686                               if ( gubCurScrollSpeedID > gubScrollSpeedEndID )
03687                               {
03688                                     gubCurScrollSpeedID = gubScrollSpeedEndID;
03689                               }
03690                         }
03691                   }
03692 
03693                   //if ( !gfDoVideoScroll )
03694                   //{
03695                   //    gubCurScrollSpeedID = 4;
03696                   //}
03697 
03698 
03699                   // Adjust speed based on whether shift is down
03700                   if ( _KeyDown( SHIFT ) )
03701                   {
03702                         sScrollXStep = gubNewScrollXSpeeds[ gfDoVideoScroll ][ 3 ];
03703                         sScrollYStep = gubNewScrollYSpeeds[ gfDoVideoScroll ][ 3 ];
03704                   }
03705                   else
03706                   {
03707                         sScrollXStep = gubNewScrollXSpeeds[ gfDoVideoScroll ][ gubCurScrollSpeedID ];
03708                         sScrollYStep = gubNewScrollYSpeeds[ gfDoVideoScroll ][ gubCurScrollSpeedID ];
03709                   }
03710 
03711 
03712                   // Set diagonal flags!
03713                   if ( ( ScrollFlags & SCROLL_LEFT ) && ( ScrollFlags & SCROLL_UP ) )
03714                   {
03715                         ScrollFlags = SCROLL_UPLEFT;
03716                   }
03717                   if ( ( ScrollFlags & SCROLL_RIGHT ) && ( ScrollFlags & SCROLL_UP ) )
03718                   {
03719                         ScrollFlags = SCROLL_UPRIGHT;
03720                   }
03721                   if ( ( ScrollFlags & SCROLL_LEFT ) && ( ScrollFlags & SCROLL_DOWN ) )
03722                   {
03723                         ScrollFlags = SCROLL_DOWNLEFT;
03724                   }
03725                   if ( ( ScrollFlags & SCROLL_RIGHT ) && ( ScrollFlags & SCROLL_DOWN ) )
03726                   {
03727                         ScrollFlags = SCROLL_DOWNRIGHT;
03728                   }
03729 
03730                   fAGoodMove = HandleScrollDirections( ScrollFlags, sScrollXStep, sScrollYStep, &sTempRenderCenterX, &sTempRenderCenterY, TRUE );
03731       } 
03732 
03733       // Has this been an OK scroll?
03734       if ( fAGoodMove )
03735       {
03736             if ( COUNTERDONE( NEXTSCROLL ) )
03737             {
03738                   RESETCOUNTER( NEXTSCROLL );
03739 
03740                   // Are we starting a new scroll?
03741                   if ( gfScrollInertia == 0 && gfScrollPending == FALSE )
03742                   {
03743                               // We are starting to scroll - setup scroll pending
03744                               gfScrollPending = TRUE;
03745 
03746                               // Remove any interface stuff
03747                               ClearInterface( );
03748 
03749                               // Return so that next frame things will be erased!               
03750                               return;
03751                   }
03752 
03753                   // If here, set scroll pending to false
03754                   gfScrollPending = FALSE;
03755 
03756 
03757                   // INcrement scroll intertia
03758                   gfScrollInertia++;
03759 
03760                   // Now we actually begin our scrolling
03761                   HandleScrollDirections( ScrollFlags, sScrollXStep, sScrollYStep, &sTempRenderCenterX, &sTempRenderCenterY, FALSE );
03762 
03763                   if( gfNextRefreshFullScreen ) SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
03764             }                 
03765       }
03766       else
03767       {
03768             // ATE: Also if scroll pending never got to scroll....
03769             if ( gfScrollPending == TRUE )
03770             {
03771                   // Do a complete rebuild!
03772                   gfScrollPending = FALSE;
03773 
03774                   // Restore Interface!
03775                   RestoreInterface( );
03776 
03777                   // Delete Topmost blitters saved areas
03778                   DeleteVideoOverlaysArea( );
03779 
03780             }
03781 
03782             // Check if we have just stopped scrolling!
03783             if ( gfScrollInertia != FALSE  )
03784             {
03785                   SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL | RENDER_FLAG_CHECKZ );
03786 
03787                   // Restore Interface!
03788                   RestoreInterface( );
03789 
03790                   // Delete Topmost blitters saved areas
03791                   DeleteVideoOverlaysArea( );
03792 
03793             }
03794 
03795             gfScrollInertia = FALSE;
03796             gfScrollPending = FALSE;
03797             
03798             if ( gfDoSubtileScroll )
03799             {           
03800                   gubCurScrollSpeedID = gubScrollSpeedStartID;
03801             }
03802 
03803       }
03804 }

03827 void InitRenderParams( UINT8 ubRestrictionID )
03828 {
03829             INT16 gsTilesX, gsTilesY;

03832 
03833             switch( ubRestrictionID )
03834             {
03835                   case 0:           //Default!
03836

03838                         gTopLeftWorldLimitY = ( WORLD_ROWS / 2 ) * CELL_X_SIZE;           
03839 
03840                         gTopRightWorldLimitX = ( WORLD_COLS / 2 ) * CELL_Y_SIZE;          
03841                         gTopRightWorldLimitY = CELL_X_SIZE;       
03842

03844                         gBottomLeftWorldLimitY = ( WORLD_ROWS * CELL_Y_SIZE );            
03845

03847                         gBottomRightWorldLimitY = ( ( WORLD_ROWS / 2 ) * CELL_X_SIZE );         
03848                         break;
03849 
03850                   case 1:           // BAEMENT LEVEL 1
03851 
03852                         gTopLeftWorldLimitX = ( 3 * WORLD_ROWS / 10 ) * CELL_X_SIZE;            
03853                         gTopLeftWorldLimitY = ( WORLD_ROWS / 2 ) * CELL_X_SIZE;     
03854 
03855                         gTopRightWorldLimitX = ( WORLD_ROWS / 2 ) * CELL_X_SIZE;    
03856                         gTopRightWorldLimitY = ( 3 * WORLD_COLS / 10 ) * CELL_X_SIZE;           
03857                         
03858                         gBottomLeftWorldLimitX = ( WORLD_ROWS / 2 ) * CELL_X_SIZE;  
03859                         gBottomLeftWorldLimitY = ( 7 * WORLD_COLS / 10 ) * CELL_X_SIZE;
03860 
03861                         gBottomRightWorldLimitX = ( 7 * WORLD_ROWS / 10 ) * CELL_X_SIZE;  
03862                         gBottomRightWorldLimitY = ( WORLD_ROWS / 2 ) * CELL_X_SIZE;       
03863                         break;

03865             }
03866
