03918 // Appy? HEahehahehahehae.....
03919 BOOLEAN ApplyScrolling( INT16 sTempRenderCenterX, INT16 sTempRenderCenterY, BOOLEAN fForceAdjust, BOOLEAN fCheckOnly )
03920 {
03921       BOOLEAN           fScrollGood = FALSE;
03922       BOOLEAN           fOutLeft = FALSE;
03923       BOOLEAN           fOutRight = FALSE;
03924       BOOLEAN           fOutTop = FALSE;
03925       BOOLEAN           fOutBottom = FALSE;
03926 
03927 
03928       double      dOpp, dAdj, dAngle;
03929 
03930       INT16 sTopLeftWorldX, sTopLeftWorldY;
03931       INT16 sTopRightWorldX, sTopRightWorldY;
03932       INT16 sBottomLeftWorldX, sBottomLeftWorldY;
03933       INT16 sBottomRightWorldX, sBottomRightWorldY;
03934 
03935       INT16 sTempPosX_W, sTempPosY_W;
03936 
03937 
03938       // For debug text for all 4 angles
03939       double at1, at2, at3, at4;
03940 
03941       INT16 sX_S, sY_S;
03942       INT16 sScreenCenterX, sScreenCenterY;
03943       INT16 sDistToCenterY, sDistToCenterX;
03944       INT16 sNewScreenX, sNewScreenY;
03945       INT16 sMult;
03946 
03947 
03948       //Makesure it's a multiple of 5
03949       sMult = sTempRenderCenterX / CELL_X_SIZE;
03950       sTempRenderCenterX = ( sMult * CELL_X_SIZE ) + ( CELL_X_SIZE / 2 );
03951 
03952       //Makesure it's a multiple of 5
03953       sMult = sTempRenderCenterY / CELL_X_SIZE;
03954       sTempRenderCenterY = ( sMult * CELL_Y_SIZE ) + ( CELL_Y_SIZE / 2 );
03955 
03956       
03957       // Find the diustance from render center to true world center
03958       sDistToCenterX = sTempRenderCenterX - gCenterWorldX;
03959       sDistToCenterY = sTempRenderCenterY - gCenterWorldY;
03960       
03961       // From render center in world coords, convert to render center in "screen" coords
03962       FromCellToScreenCoordinates( sDistToCenterX , sDistToCenterY, &sScreenCenterX, &sScreenCenterY );
03963 
03964       // Subtract screen center
03965       sScreenCenterX += gsCX;
03966       sScreenCenterY += gsCY;
03967       
03968       // Adjust for offset position on screen
03969       sScreenCenterX -= 0;
03970       sScreenCenterY -= 10;
03971 
03972 
03973       // Get corners in screen coords
03974       // TOP LEFT
03975       sX_S = ( gsVIEWPORT_END_X - gsVIEWPORT_START_X ) /2;
03976       sY_S = ( gsVIEWPORT_END_Y - gsVIEWPORT_START_Y ) /2;
03977 
03978       sTopLeftWorldX = sScreenCenterX  - sX_S;
03979       sTopLeftWorldY = sScreenCenterY  - sY_S;
03980 
03981       sTopRightWorldX = sScreenCenterX  + sX_S;
03982       sTopRightWorldY = sScreenCenterY  - sY_S;
03983       
03984       sBottomLeftWorldX = sScreenCenterX  - sX_S;
03985       sBottomLeftWorldY = sScreenCenterY  + sY_S;
03986 
03987       sBottomRightWorldX = sScreenCenterX  + sX_S;
03988       sBottomRightWorldY = sScreenCenterY  + sY_S;
03989 
03990       // Get angles
03991       // TOP LEFT CORNER FIRST
03992       dOpp = sTopLeftWorldY - gsTLY;
03993       dAdj = sTopLeftWorldX - gsTLX;
03994 
03995       dAngle = (double)atan2( dAdj, dOpp );
03996       at1 = dAngle * 180 / PI;                  
03997 
03998       if ( dAngle < 0 )
03999       {
04000             fOutLeft = TRUE;
04001       }
04002       else  if ( dAngle > PI/2 )
04003       {
04004             fOutTop = TRUE;
04005       }
04006 
04007       // TOP RIGHT CORNER
04008       dOpp = sTopRightWorldY - gsTRY;
04009       dAdj = gsTRX - sTopRightWorldX;
04010 
04011       dAngle = (double)atan2( dAdj, dOpp );
04012       at2 = dAngle * 180 / PI;                  
04013 
04014       if ( dAngle < 0 )
04015       {
04016             fOutRight = TRUE;
04017       }
04018       else if ( dAngle > PI/2 )
04019       {
04020             fOutTop = TRUE;
04021       }
04022 
04023 
04024       // BOTTOM LEFT CORNER
04025       dOpp = gsBLY - sBottomLeftWorldY;
04026       dAdj = sBottomLeftWorldX - gsBLX;
04027 
04028       dAngle = (double)atan2( dAdj, dOpp );
04029       at3 = dAngle * 180 / PI;                  
04030 
04031       if ( dAngle < 0 )
04032       {
04033             fOutLeft = TRUE;
04034       }
04035       else if ( dAngle > PI/2 )
04036       {
04037             fOutBottom = TRUE;
04038       }
04039 
04040       // BOTTOM RIGHT CORNER
04041       dOpp = gsBRY - sBottomRightWorldY;
04042       dAdj = gsBRX - sBottomRightWorldX;
04043 
04044       dAngle = (double)atan2( dAdj, dOpp );
04045       at4 = dAngle * 180 / PI;                  
04046 
04047       if ( dAngle < 0 )
04048       {
04049             fOutRight = TRUE;
04050       }
04051       else if ( dAngle > PI/2 )
04052       {
04053             fOutBottom = TRUE;
04054       }
04055 
04056       sprintf( (char *)gDebugStr, "Angles: %d %d %d %d", (int)at1, (int)at2, (int)at3, (int)at4 );
04057 
04058       if ( !fOutRight && !fOutLeft && !fOutTop && !fOutBottom )
04059       {
04060             fScrollGood = TRUE;
04061       }
04062 
04063       // If in editor, anything goes
04064       if ( gfEditMode && _KeyDown( SHIFT ) )
04065       {
04066             fScrollGood = TRUE;
04067       }
04068 
04069       // Reset some UI flags
04070       gfUIShowExitEast                                            = FALSE;
04071       gfUIShowExitWest                                            = FALSE;
04072       gfUIShowExitNorth                                           = FALSE;
04073       gfUIShowExitSouth                                           = FALSE;
04074 
04075 
04076       if ( !fScrollGood )
04077       {
04078             // Force adjustment, if true
04079             if ( fForceAdjust )
04080             {
04081                   if ( fOutTop )
04082                   {
04083                         // Adjust screen coordinates on the Y!
04084                         CorrectRenderCenter( sScreenCenterX, (INT16)(gsTLY + sY_S ), &sNewScreenX, &sNewScreenY );
04085                         FromScreenToCellCoordinates( sNewScreenX, sNewScreenY , &sTempPosX_W, &sTempPosY_W );
04086 
04087                         sTempRenderCenterX = sTempPosX_W;
04088                         sTempRenderCenterY = sTempPosY_W;
04089                         fScrollGood = TRUE;
04090                   }
04091 
04092                   if ( fOutBottom )
04093                   {
04094                         // OK, Ajust this since we get rounding errors in our two different calculations.
04095                         CorrectRenderCenter( sScreenCenterX, (INT16)(gsBLY - sY_S - 50 ), &sNewScreenX, &sNewScreenY );
04096                         FromScreenToCellCoordinates( sNewScreenX, sNewScreenY , &sTempPosX_W, &sTempPosY_W );
04097 
04098                         sTempRenderCenterX = sTempPosX_W;
04099                         sTempRenderCenterY = sTempPosY_W;
04100                         fScrollGood = TRUE;
04101                   }
04102                                     
04103                   if ( fOutLeft )
04104                   {
04105                         CorrectRenderCenter( (INT16)( gsTLX + sX_S ) , sScreenCenterY , &sNewScreenX, &sNewScreenY );
04106                         FromScreenToCellCoordinates( sNewScreenX, sNewScreenY , &sTempPosX_W, &sTempPosY_W );
04107 
04108                         sTempRenderCenterX = sTempPosX_W;
04109                         sTempRenderCenterY = sTempPosY_W;
04110                         fScrollGood = TRUE;
04111                   }
04112 
04113                   if ( fOutRight )
04114                   {
04115                         CorrectRenderCenter( (INT16)( gsTRX - sX_S ) , sScreenCenterY , &sNewScreenX, &sNewScreenY );
04116                         FromScreenToCellCoordinates( sNewScreenX, sNewScreenY , &sTempPosX_W, &sTempPosY_W );
04117 
04118                         sTempRenderCenterX = sTempPosX_W;
04119                         sTempRenderCenterY = sTempPosY_W;
04120                         fScrollGood = TRUE;
04121                   }
04122 
04123             }
04124             else
04125             {
04126                   if ( fOutRight )
04127                   {
04128                         // Check where our cursor is!
04129                         if ( gusMouseXPos >= SCREEN_WIDTH - 1 )
04130                         {
04131                               gfUIShowExitEast = TRUE;
04132                         }
04133                   }
04134 
04135                   if ( fOutLeft )
04136                   {
04137                         // Check where our cursor is!
04138                         if ( gusMouseXPos == 0 )
04139                         {
04140                               gfUIShowExitWest = TRUE;
04141                         }
04142                   }
04143 
04144                   if ( fOutTop )
04145                   {
04146                         // Check where our cursor is!
04147                         if ( gusMouseYPos == 0 )
04148                         {
04149                               gfUIShowExitNorth = TRUE;
04150                         }
04151                   }
04152 
04153                   if ( fOutBottom )
04154                   {
04155                         // Check where our cursor is!
04156                         if ( gusMouseYPos >= SCREEN_HEIGHT - 1 )
04157                         {
04158                               gfUIShowExitSouth = TRUE;
04159                         }
04160                   }
04161 
04162             }
04163       }
04164 
04165 
04166       if ( fScrollGood )
04167       {
04168             if ( !fCheckOnly )
04169             {
04170                         sprintf( (char *)gDebugStr, "Center: %d %d ", (int)gsRenderCenterX, (int)gsRenderCenterY );
04171 
04172                         //Makesure it's a multiple of 5
04173                         sMult = sTempRenderCenterX / CELL_X_SIZE;
04174                         gsRenderCenterX = ( sMult * CELL_X_SIZE ) + ( CELL_X_SIZE / 2 );
04175 
04176                         //Makesure it's a multiple of 5
04177                         sMult = sTempRenderCenterY / CELL_X_SIZE;
04178                         gsRenderCenterY = ( sMult * CELL_Y_SIZE ) + ( CELL_Y_SIZE / 2 );
04179 
04180                         //gsRenderCenterX = sTempRenderCenterX;
04181                         //gsRenderCenterY = sTempRenderCenterY;
04182 
04183                         gsTopLeftWorldX = sTopLeftWorldX - gsTLX;
04184                         gsTopLeftWorldY = sTopLeftWorldY - gsTLY;
04185 
04186                         gsTopRightWorldX = sTopRightWorldX - gsTLX;
04187                         gsTopRightWorldY = sTopRightWorldY - gsTLY;
04188                         
04189                         gsBottomLeftWorldX = sBottomLeftWorldX - gsTLX;
04190                         gsBottomLeftWorldY = sBottomLeftWorldY - gsTLY;
04191 
04192                         gsBottomRightWorldX = sBottomRightWorldX - gsTLX;
04193                         gsBottomRightWorldY = sBottomRightWorldY - gsTLY;
04194 
04195         SetPositionSndsVolumeAndPanning( );
04196             }
04197 
04198             return( TRUE );
04199       }
04200 
04201       return( FALSE );
04202 }

04214 // @@ATECLIP TO WORLD!
04215 void InvalidateWorldRedundencyRadius(INT16 sX, INT16 sY, INT16 sRadius)
04216 {
04217       INT16 sCountX, sCountY;
04218       UINT32 uiTile;
04219 
04220       SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_CHECKZ );
04221 
04222       for(sCountY=sY-sRadius; sCountY < (sY+sRadius+2); sCountY++)
04223       {
04224             for(sCountX=sX-sRadius; sCountX < (sX+sRadius+2); sCountX++)
04225             {
04226                   uiTile=FASTMAPROWCOLTOPOS(sCountY, sCountX);
04227 
04228                   gpWorldLevelData[uiTile].uiFlags |= MAPELEMENT_REEVALUATE_REDUNDENCY;
04229 
04230             }
04231       }
04232 }

04245 
04246 #define     Z_STRIP_DELTA_Y  ( Z_SUBLAYERS * 10 )
04247 
04248 /**********************************************************************************************
04249  Blt8BPPDataTo16BPPBufferTransZIncClip
04250 
04251       Blits an image into the destination buffer, using an ETRLE brush as a source, and a 16-bit
04252       buffer as a destination. As it is blitting, it checks the Z value of the ZBuffer, and if the
04253       pixel's Z level is below that of the current pixel, it is written on, and the Z value is
04254       updated to the current value, for any non-transparent pixels. The Z-buffer is 16 bit, and
04255       must be the same dimensions (including Pitch) as the destination.
04256 
04257 **********************************************************************************************/
04258 BOOLEAN Blt8BPPDataTo16BPPBufferTransZIncClip( UINT16 *pBuffer, UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES, UINT16 *pZBuffer, UINT16 usZValue, HVOBJECT hSrcVObject, INT32 iX, INT32 iY, UINT16 usIndex, SGPRect *clipregion)
04259 {
04260       UINT16 *p16BPPPalette;
04261       UINT32 uiOffset;
04262       UINT32 usHeight, usWidth, Unblitted;
04263       UINT8  *SrcPtr, *DestPtr, *ZPtr;
04264       UINT32 LineSkip;
04265   ETRLEObject *pTrav;
04266       INT32  iTempX, iTempY, LeftSkip, RightSkip, TopSkip, BottomSkip, BlitLength, BlitHeight, LSCount;
04267       INT32  ClipX1, ClipY1, ClipX2, ClipY2;
04268       UINT16 usZLevel, usZStartLevel, usZColsToGo, usZStartIndex, usCount, usZIndex, usZStartCols;
04269       INT8 *pZArray;
04270       ZStripInfo *pZInfo;
04271 
04272       // Assertions
04273       Assert( hSrcVObject != NULL );
04274       Assert( pBuffer != NULL );
04275 
04276       // Get Offsets from Index into structure
04277       pTrav = &(hSrcVObject->pETRLEObject[ usIndex ] );
04278       usHeight                      = (UINT32)pTrav->usHeight;
04279       usWidth                             = (UINT32)pTrav->usWidth;
04280       uiOffset                      = pTrav->uiDataOffset;
04281 
04282       // Add to start position of dest buffer
04283       iTempX = iX + pTrav->sOffsetX;
04284       iTempY = iY + pTrav->sOffsetY;
04285 
04286       if(clipregion==NULL)
04287       {
04288             ClipX1=ClippingRect.iLeft;
04289             ClipY1=ClippingRect.iTop;
04290             ClipX2=ClippingRect.iRight;
04291             ClipY2=ClippingRect.iBottom;
04292       }
04293       else
04294       {
04295             ClipX1=clipregion->iLeft;
04296             ClipY1=clipregion->iTop;
04297             ClipX2=clipregion->iRight;
04298             ClipY2=clipregion->iBottom;
04299       }
04300 
04301       // Calculate rows hanging off each side of the screen
04302       LeftSkip=__min(ClipX1 - min(ClipX1, iTempX), (INT32)usWidth);
04303       RightSkip=__min(max(ClipX2, (iTempX+(INT32)usWidth)) - ClipX2, (INT32)usWidth);
04304       TopSkip=__min(ClipY1 - __min(ClipY1, iTempY), (INT32)usHeight);
04305       BottomSkip=__min(__max(ClipY2, (iTempY+(INT32)usHeight)) - ClipY2, (INT32)usHeight);
04306       
04307       // calculate the remaining rows and columns to blit
04308       BlitLength=((INT32)usWidth-LeftSkip-RightSkip);
04309       BlitHeight=((INT32)usHeight-TopSkip-BottomSkip);
04310 
04311       // check if whole thing is clipped
04312       if((LeftSkip >=(INT32)usWidth) || (RightSkip >=(INT32)usWidth))   
04313             return(TRUE);
04314 
04315       // check if whole thing is clipped
04316       if((TopSkip >=(INT32)usHeight) || (BottomSkip >=(INT32)usHeight)) 
04317             return(TRUE);
04318       
04319       SrcPtr= (UINT8 *)hSrcVObject->pPixData + uiOffset;
04320       DestPtr = (UINT8 *)pBuffer + (uiDestPitchBYTES*(iTempY+TopSkip)) + ((iTempX+LeftSkip)*2);
04321       ZPtr = (UINT8 *)pZBuffer + (uiDestPitchBYTES*(iTempY+TopSkip)) + ((iTempX+LeftSkip)*2);
04322       p16BPPPalette = hSrcVObject->pShadeCurrent;
04323       LineSkip=(uiDestPitchBYTES-(BlitLength*2));
04324 
04325       if(hSrcVObject->ppZStripInfo==NULL)
04326       {
04327             DebugMsg(TOPIC_VIDEOOBJECT, DBG_LEVEL_0, String("Missing Z-Strip info on multi-Z object")); 
04328             return(FALSE);
04329       }
04330       // setup for the z-column blitting stuff
04331       pZInfo=hSrcVObject->ppZStripInfo[usIndex];
04332       if(pZInfo==NULL)
04333       {
04334             DebugMsg(TOPIC_VIDEOOBJECT, DBG_LEVEL_0, String("Missing Z-Strip info on multi-Z object")); 
04335             return(FALSE);
04336       }
04337 
04338       usZStartLevel=(UINT16)((INT16)usZValue+((INT16)pZInfo->bInitialZChange*Z_STRIP_DELTA_Y));
04339       // set to odd number of pixels for first column
04340       
04341       if(LeftSkip > pZInfo->ubFirstZStripWidth)
04342       {
04343             usZStartCols=(LeftSkip - pZInfo->ubFirstZStripWidth);
04344             usZStartCols=20-(usZStartCols%20);
04345       }
04346       else if(LeftSkip < pZInfo->ubFirstZStripWidth)
04347             usZStartCols=(UINT16)(pZInfo->ubFirstZStripWidth - LeftSkip); 
04348       else
04349             usZStartCols=20;
04350 
04351       usZColsToGo=usZStartCols;
04352 
04353       pZArray=pZInfo->pbZChange;
04354 
04355       if(LeftSkip >= pZInfo->ubFirstZStripWidth)
04356       {
04357             // Index into array after doing left clipping
04358             usZStartIndex=1 + ((LeftSkip-pZInfo->ubFirstZStripWidth)/20);
04359 
04360             //calculates the Z-value after left-side clipping
04361             if(usZStartIndex)
04362             {
04363                   for(usCount=0; usCount < usZStartIndex; usCount++)
04364                   {
04365                         switch(pZArray[usCount])
04366                         {
04367                               case -1:    usZStartLevel-=Z_STRIP_DELTA_Y;
04368                                                             break;
04369                               case 0:           //no change
04370                                                             break;
04371                               case 1:           usZStartLevel+=Z_STRIP_DELTA_Y;
04372                                                             break;
04373                         }
04374                   }
04375             }
04376       }
04377       else
04378             usZStartIndex=0;
04379 
04380       usZLevel=usZStartLevel;
04381       usZIndex=usZStartIndex;
04382 
04383       __asm {
04384 
04385             mov         esi, SrcPtr
04386             mov         edi, DestPtr
04387             mov         edx, p16BPPPalette
04388             xor         eax, eax
04389             mov         ebx, ZPtr
04390             xor         ecx, ecx
04391 
04392             cmp         TopSkip, 0                                      // check for nothing clipped on top
04393             je          LeftSkipSetup
04394 
04395 
04396 // Skips the number of lines clipped at the top
04397 TopSkipLoop:                                                            
04398             
04399             mov         cl, [esi]
04400             inc         esi
04401             or          cl, cl
04402             js          TopSkipLoop
04403             jz          TSEndLine
04404 
04405             add         esi, ecx
04406             jmp         TopSkipLoop
04407 
04408 TSEndLine:
04409             dec         TopSkip
04410             jnz         TopSkipLoop
04411 
04412 
04413 // Start of line loop
04414 
04415 // Skips the pixels hanging outside the left-side boundry
04416 LeftSkipSetup:
04417             
04418             mov         Unblitted, 0                              // Unblitted counts any pixels left from a run
04419             mov         eax, LeftSkip                             // after we have skipped enough left-side pixels
04420             mov         LSCount, eax                              // LSCount counts how many pixels skipped so far
04421             or          eax, eax                                        
04422             jz          BlitLineSetup                             // check for nothing to skip
04423 
04424 LeftSkipLoop:
04425 
04426             mov         cl, [esi]
04427             inc         esi
04428 
04429             or          cl, cl
04430             js          LSTrans
04431 
04432             cmp         ecx, LSCount
04433             je          LSSkip2                                               // if equal, skip whole, and start blit with new run
04434             jb          LSSkip1                                               // if less, skip whole thing
04435 
04436             add         esi, LSCount                              // skip partial run, jump into normal loop for rest
04437             sub         ecx, LSCount
04438             mov         eax, BlitLength
04439             mov         LSCount, eax
04440             mov         Unblitted, 0
04441             jmp         BlitNTL1                                        // *** jumps into non-transparent blit loop
04442             
04443 LSSkip2:
04444             add         esi, ecx                                        // skip whole run, and start blit with new run
04445             jmp         BlitLineSetup
04446 
04447 
04448 LSSkip1:
04449             add         esi, ecx                                        // skip whole run, continue skipping
04450             sub         LSCount, ecx
04451             jmp         LeftSkipLoop
04452 
04453 
04454 LSTrans:
04455             and         ecx, 07fH
04456             cmp         ecx, LSCount
04457             je          BlitLineSetup                             // if equal, skip whole, and start blit with new run
04458             jb          LSTrans1                                        // if less, skip whole thing
04459 
04460             sub         ecx, LSCount                                          // skip partial run, jump into normal loop for rest
04461             mov         eax, BlitLength
04462             mov         LSCount, eax
04463             mov         Unblitted, 0
04464             jmp         BlitTransparent                     // *** jumps into transparent blit loop
04465             
04466 
04467 LSTrans1:
04468             sub         LSCount, ecx                              // skip whole run, continue skipping
04469             jmp         LeftSkipLoop
04470 
04471 //-------------------------------------------------
04472 // setup for beginning of line
04473 
04474 BlitLineSetup:                                                    
04475             mov         eax, BlitLength
04476             mov         LSCount, eax
04477             mov         Unblitted, 0
04478 
04479 BlitDispatch:
04480 
04481             cmp         LSCount, 0                                      // Check to see if we're done blitting
04482             je          RightSkipLoop
04483 
04484             mov         cl, [esi]
04485             inc         esi
04486             or          cl, cl
04487             js          BlitTransparent
04488             jz          RSLoop2
04489             
04490 //--------------------------------
04491 // blitting non-transparent pixels
04492 
04493             and         ecx, 07fH
04494 
04495 BlitNTL1:
04496             mov         ax, [ebx]                                             // check z-level of pixel
04497             cmp         ax, usZLevel
04498             jae         BlitNTL2
04499 
04500             mov         ax, usZLevel                                    // update z-level of pixel
04501             mov         [ebx], ax
04502 
04503             xor         eax, eax
04504             mov         al, [esi]                                             // copy pixel
04505             mov         ax, [edx+eax*2]
04506             mov         [edi], ax
04507 
04508 BlitNTL2:
04509             inc         esi
04510             add         edi, 2
04511             add         ebx, 2
04512 
04513             dec         usZColsToGo
04514             jnz         BlitNTL6
04515 
04516 // update the z-level according to the z-table
04517 
04518             push  edx         
04519             mov         edx, pZArray                                    // get pointer to array
04520             xor         eax, eax
04521             mov         ax, usZIndex                                    // pick up the current array index
04522             add         edx, eax
04523             inc         eax                                                               // increment it
04524             mov         usZIndex, ax                                    // store incremented value
04525 
04526             mov         al, [edx]                                             // get direction instruction
04527             mov         dx, usZLevel                                    // get current z-level
04528 
04529             or          al, al
04530             jz          BlitNTL5                                              // dir = 0 no change
04531             js          BlitNTL4                                              // dir < 0 z-level down
04532                                                                                                       // dir > 0 z-level up (default)
04533             add         dx, Z_STRIP_DELTA_Y
04534             jmp         BlitNTL5
04535 
04536 BlitNTL4:
04537             sub         dx, Z_STRIP_DELTA_Y
04538 
04539 BlitNTL5:
04540             mov         usZLevel, dx                                    // store the now-modified z-level
04541             mov         usZColsToGo, 20                           // reset the next z-level change to 20 cols
04542             pop         edx
04543 
04544 BlitNTL6:
04545             dec         LSCount                                                     // decrement pixel length to blit
04546             jz          RightSkipLoop                                   // done blitting the visible line
04547             
04548             dec         ecx
04549             jnz         BlitNTL1                                              // continue current run
04550             
04551             jmp         BlitDispatch                                    // done current run, go for another
04552 
04553 
04554 //----------------------------
04555 // skipping transparent pixels
04556 
04557 BlitTransparent:                                                  // skip transparent pixels
04558 
04559             and         ecx, 07fH
04560 
04561 BlitTrans2:
04562 
04563             add         edi, 2                                                      // move up the destination pointer
04564             add         ebx, 2
04565                   
04566             dec         usZColsToGo
04567             jnz         BlitTrans1
04568 
04569 // update the z-level according to the z-table
04570 
04571             push  edx         
04572             mov         edx, pZArray                                    // get pointer to array
04573             xor         eax, eax
04574             mov         ax, usZIndex                                    // pick up the current array index
04575             add         edx, eax
04576             inc         eax                                                               // increment it
04577             mov         usZIndex, ax                                    // store incremented value
04578 
04579             mov         al, [edx]                                             // get direction instruction
04580             mov         dx, usZLevel                                    // get current z-level
04581 
04582             or          al, al
04583             jz          BlitTrans5                                      // dir = 0 no change
04584             js          BlitTrans4                                      // dir < 0 z-level down
04585                                                                                                       // dir > 0 z-level up (default)
04586             add         dx, Z_STRIP_DELTA_Y
04587             jmp         BlitTrans5
04588 
04589 BlitTrans4:
04590             sub         dx, Z_STRIP_DELTA_Y
04591 
04592 BlitTrans5:
04593             mov         usZLevel, dx                                    // store the now-modified z-level
04594             mov         usZColsToGo, 20                           // reset the next z-level change to 20 cols
04595             pop         edx
04596 
04597 BlitTrans1:
04598 
04599             dec         LSCount                                                     // decrement the pixels to blit     
04600             jz          RightSkipLoop                                   // done the line
04601 
04602             dec         ecx
04603             jnz         BlitTrans2
04604 
04605             jmp         BlitDispatch
04606 
04607 //---------------------------------------------
04608 // Scans the ETRLE until it finds an EOL marker
04609 
04610 RightSkipLoop:                                                          
04611                         
04612             
04613 RSLoop1:
04614             mov         al, [esi]
04615             inc         esi         
04616             or          al, al
04617             jnz         RSLoop1
04618 
04619 RSLoop2:
04620 
04621             dec         BlitHeight
04622             jz          BlitDone
04623             add         edi, LineSkip
04624             add         ebx, LineSkip
04625 
04626 // reset all the z-level stuff for a new line
04627 
04628             mov         ax, usZStartLevel
04629             mov         usZLevel, ax
04630             mov         ax, usZStartIndex
04631             mov         usZIndex, ax
04632             mov         ax, usZStartCols
04633             mov         usZColsToGo, ax
04634 
04635             
04636             jmp         LeftSkipSetup
04637             
04638 
04639 BlitDone:
04640       }
04641 
04642       return(TRUE);
04643 }     
04644 
04645 
04646 /**********************************************************************************************
04647  Blt8BPPDataTo16BPPBufferTransZIncClipSaveZBurnsThrough
04648 
04649       Blits an image into the destination buffer, using an ETRLE brush as a source, and a 16-bit
04650       buffer as a destination. As it is blitting, it checks the Z value of the ZBuffer, and if the
04651       pixel's Z level is below that of the current pixel, it is written on, and the Z value is
04652       updated to the current value, for any non-transparent pixels. The Z-buffer is 16 bit, and
04653       must be the same dimensions (including Pitch) as the destination.
04654 
04655 **********************************************************************************************/
04656 BOOLEAN Blt8BPPDataTo16BPPBufferTransZIncClipZSameZBurnsThrough( UINT16 *pBuffer, UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES, UINT16 *pZBuffer, UINT16 usZValue, HVOBJECT hSrcVObject, INT32 iX, INT32 iY, UINT16 usIndex, SGPRect *clipregion, INT16 usZStripIndex )
04657 {
04658       UINT16 *p16BPPPalette;
04659       UINT32 uiOffset;
04660       UINT32 usHeight, usWidth, Unblitted;
04661       UINT8  *SrcPtr, *DestPtr, *ZPtr;
04662       UINT32 LineSkip;
04663   ETRLEObject *pTrav;
04664       INT32  iTempX, iTempY, LeftSkip, RightSkip, TopSkip, BottomSkip, BlitLength, BlitHeight, LSCount;
04665       INT32  ClipX1, ClipY1, ClipX2, ClipY2;
04666       UINT16 usZLevel, usZStartLevel, usZColsToGo, usZStartIndex, usCount, usZIndex, usZStartCols;
04667       INT8 *pZArray;
04668       ZStripInfo *pZInfo;
04669 
04670       // Assertions
04671       Assert( hSrcVObject != NULL );
04672       Assert( pBuffer != NULL );
04673 
04674       // Get Offsets from Index into structure
04675       pTrav = &(hSrcVObject->pETRLEObject[ usIndex ] );
04676       usHeight                      = (UINT32)pTrav->usHeight;
04677       usWidth                             = (UINT32)pTrav->usWidth;
04678       uiOffset                      = pTrav->uiDataOffset;
04679 
04680       // Add to start position of dest buffer
04681       iTempX = iX + pTrav->sOffsetX;
04682       iTempY = iY + pTrav->sOffsetY;
04683 
04684       if(clipregion==NULL)
04685       {
04686             ClipX1=ClippingRect.iLeft;
04687             ClipY1=ClippingRect.iTop;
04688             ClipX2=ClippingRect.iRight;
04689             ClipY2=ClippingRect.iBottom;
04690       }
04691       else
04692       {
04693             ClipX1=clipregion->iLeft;
04694             ClipY1=clipregion->iTop;
04695             ClipX2=clipregion->iRight;
04696             ClipY2=clipregion->iBottom;
04697       }
04698 
04699       // Calculate rows hanging off each side of the screen
04700       LeftSkip=__min(ClipX1 - min(ClipX1, iTempX), (INT32)usWidth);
04701       RightSkip=__min(max(ClipX2, (iTempX+(INT32)usWidth)) - ClipX2, (INT32)usWidth);
04702       TopSkip=__min(ClipY1 - __min(ClipY1, iTempY), (INT32)usHeight);
04703       BottomSkip=__min(__max(ClipY2, (iTempY+(INT32)usHeight)) - ClipY2, (INT32)usHeight);
04704       
04705       // calculate the remaining rows and columns to blit
04706       BlitLength=((INT32)usWidth-LeftSkip-RightSkip);
04707       BlitHeight=((INT32)usHeight-TopSkip-BottomSkip);
04708 
04709       // check if whole thing is clipped
04710       if((LeftSkip >=(INT32)usWidth) || (RightSkip >=(INT32)usWidth))   
04711             return(TRUE);
04712 
04713       // check if whole thing is clipped
04714       if((TopSkip >=(INT32)usHeight) || (BottomSkip >=(INT32)usHeight)) 
04715             return(TRUE);
04716       
04717       SrcPtr= (UINT8 *)hSrcVObject->pPixData + uiOffset;
04718       DestPtr = (UINT8 *)pBuffer + (uiDestPitchBYTES*(iTempY+TopSkip)) + ((iTempX+LeftSkip)*2);
04719       ZPtr = (UINT8 *)pZBuffer + (uiDestPitchBYTES*(iTempY+TopSkip)) + ((iTempX+LeftSkip)*2);
04720       p16BPPPalette = hSrcVObject->pShadeCurrent;
04721       LineSkip=(uiDestPitchBYTES-(BlitLength*2));
04722 
04723       if(hSrcVObject->ppZStripInfo==NULL)
04724       {
04725             DebugMsg(TOPIC_VIDEOOBJECT, DBG_LEVEL_0, String("Missing Z-Strip info on multi-Z object")); 
04726             return(FALSE);
04727       }
04728       // setup for the z-column blitting stuff
04729       pZInfo=hSrcVObject->ppZStripInfo[ usZStripIndex ];
04730       if(pZInfo==NULL)
04731       {
04732             DebugMsg(TOPIC_VIDEOOBJECT, DBG_LEVEL_0, String("Missing Z-Strip info on multi-Z object")); 
04733             return(FALSE);
04734       }
04735 
04736       usZStartLevel=(UINT16)((INT16)usZValue+((INT16)pZInfo->bInitialZChange*Z_STRIP_DELTA_Y));
04737       // set to odd number of pixels for first column
04738       
04739       if(LeftSkip > pZInfo->ubFirstZStripWidth)
04740       {
04741             usZStartCols=(LeftSkip - pZInfo->ubFirstZStripWidth);
04742             usZStartCols=20-(usZStartCols%20);
04743       }
04744       else if(LeftSkip < pZInfo->ubFirstZStripWidth)
04745             usZStartCols=(UINT16)(pZInfo->ubFirstZStripWidth - LeftSkip); 
04746       else
04747             usZStartCols=20;
04748 
04749       usZColsToGo=usZStartCols;
04750 
04751       pZArray=pZInfo->pbZChange;
04752 
04753       if(LeftSkip >= pZInfo->ubFirstZStripWidth)
04754       {
04755             // Index into array after doing left clipping
04756             usZStartIndex=1 + ((LeftSkip-pZInfo->ubFirstZStripWidth)/20);
04757 
04758             //calculates the Z-value after left-side clipping
04759             if(usZStartIndex)
04760             {
04761                   for(usCount=0; usCount < usZStartIndex; usCount++)
04762                   {
04763                         switch(pZArray[usCount])
04764                         {
04765                               case -1:    usZStartLevel-=Z_STRIP_DELTA_Y;
04766                                                             break;
04767                               case 0:           //no change
04768                                                             break;
04769                               case 1:           usZStartLevel+=Z_STRIP_DELTA_Y;
04770                                                             break;
04771                         }
04772                   }
04773             }
04774       }
04775       else
04776             usZStartIndex=0;
04777 
04778       usZLevel=usZStartLevel;
04779       usZIndex=usZStartIndex;
04780 
04781       __asm {
04782 
04783             mov         esi, SrcPtr
04784             mov         edi, DestPtr
04785             mov         edx, p16BPPPalette
04786             xor         eax, eax
04787             mov         ebx, ZPtr
04788             xor         ecx, ecx
04789 
04790             cmp         TopSkip, 0                                      // check for nothing clipped on top
04791             je          LeftSkipSetup
04792 
04793 
04794 // Skips the number of lines clipped at the top
04795 TopSkipLoop:                                                            
04796             
04797             mov         cl, [esi]
04798             inc         esi
04799             or          cl, cl
04800             js          TopSkipLoop
04801             jz          TSEndLine
04802 
04803             add         esi, ecx
04804             jmp         TopSkipLoop
04805 
04806 TSEndLine:
04807             dec         TopSkip
04808             jnz         TopSkipLoop
04809 
04810 
04811 // Start of line loop
04812 
04813 // Skips the pixels hanging outside the left-side boundry
04814 LeftSkipSetup:
04815             
04816             mov         Unblitted, 0                              // Unblitted counts any pixels left from a run
04817             mov         eax, LeftSkip                             // after we have skipped enough left-side pixels
04818             mov         LSCount, eax                              // LSCount counts how many pixels skipped so far
04819             or          eax, eax                                        
04820             jz          BlitLineSetup                             // check for nothing to skip
04821 
04822 LeftSkipLoop:
04823 
04824             mov         cl, [esi]
04825             inc         esi
04826 
04827             or          cl, cl
04828             js          LSTrans
04829 
04830             cmp         ecx, LSCount
04831             je          LSSkip2                                               // if equal, skip whole, and start blit with new run
04832             jb          LSSkip1                                               // if less, skip whole thing
04833 
04834             add         esi, LSCount                              // skip partial run, jump into normal loop for rest
04835             sub         ecx, LSCount
04836             mov         eax, BlitLength
04837             mov         LSCount, eax
04838             mov         Unblitted, 0
04839             jmp         BlitNTL1                                        // *** jumps into non-transparent blit loop
04840             
04841 LSSkip2:
04842             add         esi, ecx                                        // skip whole run, and start blit with new run
04843             jmp         BlitLineSetup
04844 
04845 
04846 LSSkip1:
04847             add         esi, ecx                                        // skip whole run, continue skipping
04848             sub         LSCount, ecx
04849             jmp         LeftSkipLoop
04850 
04851 
04852 LSTrans:
04853             and         ecx, 07fH
04854             cmp         ecx, LSCount
04855             je          BlitLineSetup                             // if equal, skip whole, and start blit with new run
04856             jb          LSTrans1                                        // if less, skip whole thing
04857 
04858             sub         ecx, LSCount                                          // skip partial run, jump into normal loop for rest
04859             mov         eax, BlitLength
04860             mov         LSCount, eax
04861             mov         Unblitted, 0
04862             jmp         BlitTransparent                     // *** jumps into transparent blit loop
04863             
04864 
04865 LSTrans1:
04866             sub         LSCount, ecx                              // skip whole run, continue skipping
04867             jmp         LeftSkipLoop
04868 
04869 //-------------------------------------------------
04870 // setup for beginning of line
04871 
04872 BlitLineSetup:                                                    
04873             mov         eax, BlitLength
04874             mov         LSCount, eax
04875             mov         Unblitted, 0
04876 
04877 BlitDispatch:
04878 
04879             cmp         LSCount, 0                                      // Check to see if we're done blitting
04880             je          RightSkipLoop
04881 
04882             mov         cl, [esi]
04883             inc         esi
04884             or          cl, cl
04885             js          BlitTransparent
04886             jz          RSLoop2
04887             
04888 //--------------------------------
04889 // blitting non-transparent pixels
04890 
04891             and         ecx, 07fH
04892 
04893 BlitNTL1:
04894             mov         ax, [ebx]                                             // check z-level of pixel
04895             cmp         ax, usZLevel
04896             ja          BlitNTL2
04897 
04898             mov         ax, usZLevel                                    // update z-level of pixel
04899             mov         [ebx], ax
04900 
04901             xor         eax, eax
04902             mov         al, [esi]                                             // copy pixel
04903             mov         ax, [edx+eax*2]
04904             mov         [edi], ax
04905 
04906 BlitNTL2:
04907             inc         esi
04908             add         edi, 2
04909             add         ebx, 2
04910 
04911             dec         usZColsToGo
04912             jnz         BlitNTL6
04913 
04914 // update the z-level according to the z-table
04915 
04916             push  edx         
04917             mov         edx, pZArray                                    // get pointer to array
04918             xor         eax, eax
04919             mov         ax, usZIndex                                    // pick up the current array index
04920             add         edx, eax
04921             inc         eax                                                               // increment it
04922             mov         usZIndex, ax                                    // store incremented value
04923 
04924             mov         al, [edx]                                             // get direction instruction
04925             mov         dx, usZLevel                                    // get current z-level
04926 
04927             or          al, al
04928             jz          BlitNTL5                                              // dir = 0 no change
04929             js          BlitNTL4                                              // dir < 0 z-level down
04930                                                                                                       // dir > 0 z-level up (default)
04931             add         dx, Z_STRIP_DELTA_Y
04932             jmp         BlitNTL5
04933 
04934 BlitNTL4:
04935             sub         dx, Z_STRIP_DELTA_Y
04936 
04937 BlitNTL5:
04938             mov         usZLevel, dx                                    // store the now-modified z-level
04939             mov         usZColsToGo, 20                           // reset the next z-level change to 20 cols
04940             pop         edx
04941 
04942 BlitNTL6:
04943             dec         LSCount                                                     // decrement pixel length to blit
04944             jz          RightSkipLoop                                   // done blitting the visible line
04945             
04946             dec         ecx
04947             jnz         BlitNTL1                                              // continue current run
04948             
04949             jmp         BlitDispatch                                    // done current run, go for another
04950 
04951 
04952 //----------------------------
04953 // skipping transparent pixels
04954 
04955 BlitTransparent:                                                  // skip transparent pixels
04956 
04957             and         ecx, 07fH
04958 
04959 BlitTrans2:
04960 
04961             add         edi, 2                                                      // move up the destination pointer
04962             add         ebx, 2
04963                   
04964             dec         usZColsToGo
04965             jnz         BlitTrans1
04966 
04967 // update the z-level according to the z-table
04968 
04969             push  edx         
04970             mov         edx, pZArray                                    // get pointer to array
04971             xor         eax, eax
04972             mov         ax, usZIndex                                    // pick up the current array index
04973             add         edx, eax
04974             inc         eax                                                               // increment it
04975             mov         usZIndex, ax                                    // store incremented value
04976 
04977             mov         al, [edx]                                             // get direction instruction
04978             mov         dx, usZLevel                                    // get current z-level
04979 
04980             or          al, al
04981             jz          BlitTrans5                                      // dir = 0 no change
04982             js          BlitTrans4                                      // dir < 0 z-level down
04983                                                                                                       // dir > 0 z-level up (default)
04984             add         dx, Z_STRIP_DELTA_Y
04985             jmp         BlitTrans5
04986 
04987 BlitTrans4:
04988             sub         dx, Z_STRIP_DELTA_Y
04989 
04990 BlitTrans5:
04991             mov         usZLevel, dx                                    // store the now-modified z-level
04992             mov         usZColsToGo, 20                           // reset the next z-level change to 20 cols
04993             pop         edx
04994 
04995 BlitTrans1:
04996 
04997             dec         LSCount                                                     // decrement the pixels to blit     
04998             jz          RightSkipLoop                                   // done the line
04999 
05000             dec         ecx
05001             jnz         BlitTrans2
05002 
05003             jmp         BlitDispatch
05004 
05005 //---------------------------------------------
05006 // Scans the ETRLE until it finds an EOL marker
05007 
05008 RightSkipLoop:                                                          
05009                         
05010             
05011 RSLoop1:
05012             mov         al, [esi]
05013             inc         esi         
05014             or          al, al
05015             jnz         RSLoop1
05016 
05017 RSLoop2:
05018 
05019             dec         BlitHeight
05020             jz          BlitDone
05021             add         edi, LineSkip
05022             add         ebx, LineSkip
05023 
05024 // reset all the z-level stuff for a new line
05025 
05026             mov         ax, usZStartLevel
05027             mov         usZLevel, ax
05028             mov         ax, usZStartIndex
05029             mov         usZIndex, ax
05030             mov         ax, usZStartCols
05031             mov         usZColsToGo, ax
05032 
05033             
05034             jmp         LeftSkipSetup
05035             
05036 
05037 BlitDone:
05038       }
05039 
05040       return(TRUE);
05041 }     
05042 
05043 
05044 /**********************************************************************************************
05045  Blt8BPPDataTo16BPPBufferTransZIncObscureClip
05046 
05047       Blits an image into the destination buffer, using an ETRLE brush as a source, and a 16-bit
05048       buffer as a destination. As it is blitting, it checks the Z value of the ZBuffer, and if the
05049       pixel's Z level is below that of the current pixel, it is written on, and the Z value is
05050       updated to the current value, for any non-transparent pixels. The Z-buffer is 16 bit, and
05051       must be the same dimensions (including Pitch) as the destination.
05052 
05053       //ATE: This blitter makes the values that are =< z value pixellate rather than not
05054       // render at all
05055 
05056 **********************************************************************************************/
05057 BOOLEAN Blt8BPPDataTo16BPPBufferTransZIncObscureClip( UINT16 *pBuffer, UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES, UINT16 *pZBuffer, UINT16 usZValue, HVOBJECT hSrcVObject, INT32 iX, INT32 iY, UINT16 usIndex, SGPRect *clipregion)
05058 {
05059       UINT16 *p16BPPPalette;
05060       UINT32 uiOffset, uiLineFlag;
05061       UINT32 usHeight, usWidth, Unblitted;
05062       UINT8  *SrcPtr, *DestPtr, *ZPtr;
05063       UINT32 LineSkip;
05064   ETRLEObject *pTrav;
05065       INT32  iTempX, iTempY, LeftSkip, RightSkip, TopSkip, BottomSkip, BlitLength, BlitHeight, LSCount;
05066       INT32  ClipX1, ClipY1, ClipX2, ClipY2;
05067       UINT16 usZLevel, usZStartLevel, usZColsToGo, usZStartIndex, usCount, usZIndex, usZStartCols;
05068       INT8 *pZArray;
05069       ZStripInfo *pZInfo;
05070 
05071       // Assertions
05072       Assert( hSrcVObject != NULL );
05073       Assert( pBuffer != NULL );
05074 
05075       // Get Offsets from Index into structure
05076       pTrav = &(hSrcVObject->pETRLEObject[ usIndex ] );
05077       usHeight                      = (UINT32)pTrav->usHeight;
05078       usWidth                             = (UINT32)pTrav->usWidth;
05079       uiOffset                      = pTrav->uiDataOffset;
05080 
05081       // Add to start position of dest buffer
05082       iTempX = iX + pTrav->sOffsetX;
05083       iTempY = iY + pTrav->sOffsetY;
05084 
05085 
05086       if(clipregion==NULL)
05087       {
05088             ClipX1=ClippingRect.iLeft;
05089             ClipY1=ClippingRect.iTop;
05090             ClipX2=ClippingRect.iRight;
05091             ClipY2=ClippingRect.iBottom;
05092       }
05093       else
05094       {
05095             ClipX1=clipregion->iLeft;
05096             ClipY1=clipregion->iTop;
05097             ClipX2=clipregion->iRight;
05098             ClipY2=clipregion->iBottom;
05099       }
05100 
05101       // Calculate rows hanging off each side of the screen
05102       LeftSkip=__min(ClipX1 - min(ClipX1, iTempX), (INT32)usWidth);
05103       RightSkip=__min(max(ClipX2, (iTempX+(INT32)usWidth)) - ClipX2, (INT32)usWidth);
05104       TopSkip=__min(ClipY1 - __min(ClipY1, iTempY), (INT32)usHeight);
05105       BottomSkip=__min(__max(ClipY2, (iTempY+(INT32)usHeight)) - ClipY2, (INT32)usHeight);
05106       
05107       uiLineFlag=(iTempY&1);
05108 
05109       // calculate the remaining rows and columns to blit
05110       BlitLength=((INT32)usWidth-LeftSkip-RightSkip);
05111       BlitHeight=((INT32)usHeight-TopSkip-BottomSkip);
05112 
05113       // check if whole thing is clipped
05114       if((LeftSkip >=(INT32)usWidth) || (RightSkip >=(INT32)usWidth))   
05115             return(TRUE);
05116 
05117       // check if whole thing is clipped
05118       if((TopSkip >=(INT32)usHeight) || (BottomSkip >=(INT32)usHeight)) 
05119             return(TRUE);
05120       
05121       SrcPtr= (UINT8 *)hSrcVObject->pPixData + uiOffset;
05122       DestPtr = (UINT8 *)pBuffer + (uiDestPitchBYTES*(iTempY+TopSkip)) + ((iTempX+LeftSkip)*2);
05123       ZPtr = (UINT8 *)pZBuffer + (uiDestPitchBYTES*(iTempY+TopSkip)) + ((iTempX+LeftSkip)*2);
05124       p16BPPPalette = hSrcVObject->pShadeCurrent;
05125       LineSkip=(uiDestPitchBYTES-(BlitLength*2));
05126 
05127       if(hSrcVObject->ppZStripInfo==NULL)
05128       {
05129             DebugMsg(TOPIC_VIDEOOBJECT, DBG_LEVEL_0, String("Missing Z-Strip info on multi-Z object")); 
05130             return(FALSE);
05131       }
05132       // setup for the z-column blitting stuff
05133       pZInfo=hSrcVObject->ppZStripInfo[usIndex];
05134       if(pZInfo==NULL)
05135       {
05136             DebugMsg(TOPIC_VIDEOOBJECT, DBG_LEVEL_0, String("Missing Z-Strip info on multi-Z object")); 
05137             return(FALSE);
05138       }
05139 
05140       usZStartLevel=(UINT16)((INT16)usZValue+((INT16)pZInfo->bInitialZChange*Z_STRIP_DELTA_Y));
05141       // set to odd number of pixels for first column
05142       
05143       if(LeftSkip > pZInfo->ubFirstZStripWidth)
05144       {
05145             usZStartCols=(LeftSkip - pZInfo->ubFirstZStripWidth);
05146             usZStartCols=20-(usZStartCols%20);
05147       }
05148       else if(LeftSkip < pZInfo->ubFirstZStripWidth)
05149             usZStartCols=(UINT16)(pZInfo->ubFirstZStripWidth - LeftSkip); 
05150       else
05151             usZStartCols=20;
05152 
05153       usZColsToGo=usZStartCols;
05154 
05155       pZArray=pZInfo->pbZChange;
05156 
05157       if(LeftSkip >= pZInfo->ubFirstZStripWidth)
05158       {
05159             // Index into array after doing left clipping
05160             usZStartIndex=1 + ((LeftSkip-pZInfo->ubFirstZStripWidth)/20);
05161 
05162             //calculates the Z-value after left-side clipping
05163             if(usZStartIndex)
05164             {
05165                   for(usCount=0; usCount < usZStartIndex; usCount++)
05166                   {
05167                         switch(pZArray[usCount])
05168                         {
05169                               case -1:    usZStartLevel-=Z_STRIP_DELTA_Y;
05170                                                             break;
05171                               case 0:           //no change
05172                                                             break;
05173                               case 1:           usZStartLevel+=Z_STRIP_DELTA_Y;
05174                                                             break;
05175                         }
05176                   }
05177             }
05178       }
05179       else
05180             usZStartIndex=0;
05181 
05182       usZLevel=usZStartLevel;
05183       usZIndex=usZStartIndex;
05184 
05185       __asm {
05186 
05187             mov         esi, SrcPtr
05188             mov         edi, DestPtr
05189             mov         edx, p16BPPPalette
05190             xor         eax, eax
05191             mov         ebx, ZPtr
05192             xor         ecx, ecx
05193 
05194             cmp         TopSkip, 0                                      // check for nothing clipped on top
05195             je          LeftSkipSetup
05196 
05197 
05198 // Skips the number of lines clipped at the top
05199 TopSkipLoop:                                                            
05200             
05201             mov         cl, [esi]
05202             inc         esi
05203             or          cl, cl
05204             js          TopSkipLoop
05205             jz          TSEndLine
05206 
05207             add         esi, ecx
05208             jmp         TopSkipLoop
05209 
05210 TSEndLine:
05211 
05212             xor         uiLineFlag, 1
05213             dec         TopSkip
05214             jnz         TopSkipLoop
05215 
05216 
05217 // Start of line loop
05218 
05219 // Skips the pixels hanging outside the left-side boundry
05220 LeftSkipSetup:
05221             
05222             mov         Unblitted, 0                              // Unblitted counts any pixels left from a run
05223             mov         eax, LeftSkip                             // after we have skipped enough left-side pixels
05224             mov         LSCount, eax                              // LSCount counts how many pixels skipped so far
05225             or          eax, eax                                        
05226             jz          BlitLineSetup                             // check for nothing to skip
05227 
05228 LeftSkipLoop:
05229 
05230             mov         cl, [esi]
05231             inc         esi
05232 
05233             or          cl, cl
05234             js          LSTrans
05235 
05236             cmp         ecx, LSCount
05237             je          LSSkip2                                               // if equal, skip whole, and start blit with new run
05238             jb          LSSkip1                                               // if less, skip whole thing
05239 
05240             add         esi, LSCount                              // skip partial run, jump into normal loop for rest
05241             sub         ecx, LSCount
05242             mov         eax, BlitLength
05243             mov         LSCount, eax
05244             mov         Unblitted, 0
05245             jmp         BlitNTL1                                        // *** jumps into non-transparent blit loop
05246             
05247 LSSkip2:
05248             add         esi, ecx                                        // skip whole run, and start blit with new run
05249             jmp         BlitLineSetup
05250 
05251 
05252 LSSkip1:
05253             add         esi, ecx                                        // skip whole run, continue skipping
05254             sub         LSCount, ecx
05255             jmp         LeftSkipLoop
05256 
05257 
05258 LSTrans:
05259             and         ecx, 07fH
05260             cmp         ecx, LSCount
05261             je          BlitLineSetup                             // if equal, skip whole, and start blit with new run
05262             jb          LSTrans1                                        // if less, skip whole thing
05263 
05264             sub         ecx, LSCount                                          // skip partial run, jump into normal loop for rest
05265             mov         eax, BlitLength
05266             mov         LSCount, eax
05267             mov         Unblitted, 0
05268             jmp         BlitTransparent                     // *** jumps into transparent blit loop
05269             
05270 
05271 LSTrans1:
05272             sub         LSCount, ecx                              // skip whole run, continue skipping
05273             jmp         LeftSkipLoop
05274 
05275 //-------------------------------------------------
05276 // setup for beginning of line
05277 
05278 BlitLineSetup:                                                    
05279             mov         eax, BlitLength
05280             mov         LSCount, eax
05281             mov         Unblitted, 0
05282 
05283 BlitDispatch:
05284 
05285             cmp         LSCount, 0                                      // Check to see if we're done blitting
05286             je          RightSkipLoop
05287 
05288             mov         cl, [esi]
05289             inc         esi
05290             or          cl, cl
05291             js          BlitTransparent
05292             jz          RSLoop2
05293             
05294 //--------------------------------
05295 // blitting non-transparent pixels
05296 
05297             and         ecx, 07fH
05298 
05299 BlitNTL1:
05300             mov         ax, [ebx]                                             // check z-level of pixel
05301             cmp         ax, usZLevel
05302             jae         BlitPixellate1
05303             jmp   BlitPixel1
05304 
05305 BlitPixellate1:
05306 
05307             // OK, DO PIXELLATE SCHEME HERE!
05308             test  uiLineFlag, 1
05309             jz          BlitSkip1
05310 
05311             test  edi, 2
05312             jz          BlitNTL2
05313             jmp         BlitPixel1
05314 
05315 BlitSkip1:
05316             test  edi, 2
05317             jnz         BlitNTL2
05318             
05319 BlitPixel1:
05320 
05321             mov         ax, usZLevel                                    // update z-level of pixel
05322             mov         [ebx], ax
05323 
05324             xor         eax, eax
05325             mov         al, [esi]                                             // copy pixel
05326             mov         ax, [edx+eax*2]
05327             mov         [edi], ax
05328 
05329 BlitNTL2:
05330             inc         esi
05331             add         edi, 2
05332             add         ebx, 2
05333 
05334             dec         usZColsToGo
05335             jnz         BlitNTL6
05336 
05337 // update the z-level according to the z-table
05338 
05339             push  edx         
05340             mov         edx, pZArray                                    // get pointer to array
05341             xor         eax, eax
05342             mov         ax, usZIndex                                    // pick up the current array index
05343             add         edx, eax
05344             inc         eax                                                               // increment it
05345             mov         usZIndex, ax                                    // store incremented value
05346 
05347             mov         al, [edx]                                             // get direction instruction
05348             mov         dx, usZLevel                                    // get current z-level
05349 
05350             or          al, al
05351             jz          BlitNTL5                                              // dir = 0 no change
05352             js          BlitNTL4                                              // dir < 0 z-level down
05353                                                                                                       // dir > 0 z-level up (default)
05354             add         dx, Z_STRIP_DELTA_Y
05355             jmp         BlitNTL5
05356 
05357 BlitNTL4:
05358             sub         dx, Z_STRIP_DELTA_Y
05359 
05360 BlitNTL5:
05361             mov         usZLevel, dx                                    // store the now-modified z-level
05362             mov         usZColsToGo, 20                           // reset the next z-level change to 20 cols
05363             pop         edx
05364 
05365 BlitNTL6:
05366             dec         LSCount                                                     // decrement pixel length to blit
05367             jz          RightSkipLoop                                   // done blitting the visible line
05368             
05369             dec         ecx
05370             jnz         BlitNTL1                                              // continue current run
05371             
05372             jmp         BlitDispatch                                    // done current run, go for another
05373 
05374 
05375 //----------------------------
05376 // skipping transparent pixels
05377 
05378 BlitTransparent:                                                  // skip transparent pixels
05379 
05380             and         ecx, 07fH
05381 
05382 BlitTrans2:
05383 
05384             add         edi, 2                                                      // move up the destination pointer
05385             add         ebx, 2
05386                   
05387             dec         usZColsToGo
05388             jnz         BlitTrans1
05389 
05390 // update the z-level according to the z-table
05391 
05392             push  edx         
05393             mov         edx, pZArray                                    // get pointer to array
05394             xor         eax, eax
05395             mov         ax, usZIndex                                    // pick up the current array index
05396             add         edx, eax
05397             inc         eax                                                               // increment it
05398             mov         usZIndex, ax                                    // store incremented value
05399 
05400             mov         al, [edx]                                             // get direction instruction
05401             mov         dx, usZLevel                                    // get current z-level
05402 
05403             or          al, al
05404             jz          BlitTrans5                                      // dir = 0 no change
05405             js          BlitTrans4                                      // dir < 0 z-level down
05406                                                                                                       // dir > 0 z-level up (default)
05407             add         dx, Z_STRIP_DELTA_Y
05408             jmp         BlitTrans5
05409 
05410 BlitTrans4:
05411             sub         dx, Z_STRIP_DELTA_Y
05412 
05413 BlitTrans5:
05414             mov         usZLevel, dx                                    // store the now-modified z-level
05415             mov         usZColsToGo, 20                           // reset the next z-level change to 20 cols
05416             pop         edx
05417 
05418 BlitTrans1:
05419 
05420             dec         LSCount                                                     // decrement the pixels to blit     
05421             jz          RightSkipLoop                                   // done the line
05422 
05423             dec         ecx
05424             jnz         BlitTrans2
05425 
05426             jmp         BlitDispatch
05427 
05428 //---------------------------------------------
05429 // Scans the ETRLE until it finds an EOL marker
05430 
05431 RightSkipLoop:                                                          
05432                         
05433             
05434 RSLoop1:
05435             mov         al, [esi]
05436             inc         esi         
05437             or          al, al
05438             jnz         RSLoop1
05439 
05440 RSLoop2:
05441 
05442             xor         uiLineFlag, 1
05443             dec         BlitHeight
05444             jz          BlitDone
05445             add         edi, LineSkip
05446             add         ebx, LineSkip
05447 
05448 // reset all the z-level stuff for a new line
05449 
05450             mov         ax, usZStartLevel
05451             mov         usZLevel, ax
05452             mov         ax, usZStartIndex
05453             mov         usZIndex, ax
05454             mov         ax, usZStartCols
05455             mov         usZColsToGo, ax
05456 
05457             
05458             jmp         LeftSkipSetup
05459             
05460 
05461 BlitDone:
05462       }
05463 
05464       return(TRUE);
05465 }     
05466 
05467 
05468 // Blitter Specs
05469 // 1 ) 8 to 16 bpp
05470 // 2 ) strip z-blitter
05471 // 3 ) clipped
05472 // 4 ) trans shadow - if value is 254, makes a shadow
05473 //
05474 BOOLEAN Blt8BPPDataTo16BPPBufferTransZTransShadowIncObscureClip( UINT16 *pBuffer, UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES, UINT16 *pZBuffer, UINT16 usZValue, HVOBJECT hSrcVObject, INT32 iX, INT32 iY, UINT16 usIndex, SGPRect *clipregion, INT16 sZIndex, UINT16 *p16BPPPalette )
05475 {
05476       UINT32 uiOffset, uiLineFlag;
05477       UINT32 usHeight, usWidth, Unblitted;
05478       UINT8  *SrcPtr, *DestPtr, *ZPtr;
05479       UINT32 LineSkip;
05480   ETRLEObject *pTrav;
05481       INT32  iTempX, iTempY, LeftSkip, RightSkip, TopSkip, BottomSkip, BlitLength, BlitHeight, LSCount;
05482       INT32  ClipX1, ClipY1, ClipX2, ClipY2;
05483       UINT16 usZLevel, usZStartLevel, usZColsToGo, usZStartIndex, usCount, usZIndex, usZStartCols;
05484       INT8 *pZArray;
05485       ZStripInfo *pZInfo;
05486 
05487       // Assertions
05488       Assert( hSrcVObject != NULL );
05489       Assert( pBuffer != NULL );
05490 
05491       // Get Offsets from Index into structure
05492       pTrav = &(hSrcVObject->pETRLEObject[ usIndex ] );
05493       usHeight                      = (UINT32)pTrav->usHeight;
05494       usWidth                             = (UINT32)pTrav->usWidth;
05495       uiOffset                      = pTrav->uiDataOffset;
05496 
05497       // Add to start position of dest buffer
05498       iTempX = iX + pTrav->sOffsetX;
05499       iTempY = iY + pTrav->sOffsetY;
05500 
05501       if(clipregion==NULL)
05502       {
05503             ClipX1=ClippingRect.iLeft;
05504             ClipY1=ClippingRect.iTop;
05505             ClipX2=ClippingRect.iRight;
05506             ClipY2=ClippingRect.iBottom;
05507       }
05508       else
05509       {
05510             ClipX1=clipregion->iLeft;
05511             ClipY1=clipregion->iTop;
05512             ClipX2=clipregion->iRight;
05513             ClipY2=clipregion->iBottom;
05514       }
05515 
05516       // Calculate rows hanging off each side of the screen
05517       LeftSkip=__min(ClipX1 - min(ClipX1, iTempX), (INT32)usWidth);
05518       RightSkip=__min(max(ClipX2, (iTempX+(INT32)usWidth)) - ClipX2, (INT32)usWidth);
05519       TopSkip=__min(ClipY1 - __min(ClipY1, iTempY), (INT32)usHeight);
05520       BottomSkip=__min(__max(ClipY2, (iTempY+(INT32)usHeight)) - ClipY2, (INT32)usHeight);
05521       
05522       uiLineFlag=(iTempY&1);
05523 
05524       // calculate the remaining rows and columns to blit
05525       BlitLength=((INT32)usWidth-LeftSkip-RightSkip);
05526       BlitHeight=((INT32)usHeight-TopSkip-BottomSkip);
05527 
05528       // check if whole thing is clipped
05529       if((LeftSkip >=(INT32)usWidth) || (RightSkip >=(INT32)usWidth))   
05530             return(TRUE);
05531 
05532       // check if whole thing is clipped
05533       if((TopSkip >=(INT32)usHeight) || (BottomSkip >=(INT32)usHeight)) 
05534             return(TRUE);
05535       
05536       SrcPtr= (UINT8 *)hSrcVObject->pPixData + uiOffset;
05537       DestPtr = (UINT8 *)pBuffer + (uiDestPitchBYTES*(iTempY+TopSkip)) + ((iTempX+LeftSkip)*2);
05538       ZPtr = (UINT8 *)pZBuffer + (uiDestPitchBYTES*(iTempY+TopSkip)) + ((iTempX+LeftSkip)*2);
05539       LineSkip=(uiDestPitchBYTES-(BlitLength*2));
05540 
05541       if(hSrcVObject->ppZStripInfo==NULL)
05542       {
05543             DebugMsg(TOPIC_VIDEOOBJECT, DBG_LEVEL_0, String("Missing Z-Strip info on multi-Z object")); 
05544             return(FALSE);
05545       }
05546       // setup for the z-column blitting stuff
05547       pZInfo=hSrcVObject->ppZStripInfo[sZIndex];
05548       if(pZInfo==NULL)
05549       {
05550             DebugMsg(TOPIC_VIDEOOBJECT, DBG_LEVEL_0, String("Missing Z-Strip info on multi-Z object")); 
05551             return(FALSE);
05552       }
05553 
05554       usZStartLevel=(UINT16)((INT16)usZValue+((INT16)pZInfo->bInitialZChange*Z_SUBLAYERS*10));
05555 
05556       if(LeftSkip > pZInfo->ubFirstZStripWidth)
05557       {
05558             usZStartCols=(LeftSkip - pZInfo->ubFirstZStripWidth);
05559             usZStartCols=20-(usZStartCols%20);
05560       }
05561       else if(LeftSkip < pZInfo->ubFirstZStripWidth)
05562             usZStartCols=(UINT16)(pZInfo->ubFirstZStripWidth - LeftSkip); 
05563       else
05564             usZStartCols=20;
05565 
05566       // set to odd number of pixels for first column
05567       usZColsToGo=usZStartCols;
05568 
05569       pZArray=pZInfo->pbZChange;
05570 
05571       if(LeftSkip >= usZColsToGo)
05572       {
05573             // Index into array after doing left clipping
05574             usZStartIndex=1 + ((LeftSkip-pZInfo->ubFirstZStripWidth)/20);
05575 
05576             //calculates the Z-value after left-side clipping
05577             if(usZStartIndex)
05578             {
05579                   for(usCount=0; usCount < usZStartIndex; usCount++)
05580                   {
05581                         switch(pZArray[usCount])
05582                         {
05583                               case -1:    usZStartLevel-=Z_SUBLAYERS;
05584                                                             break;
05585                               case 0:           //no change
05586                                                             break;
05587                               case 1:           usZStartLevel+=Z_SUBLAYERS;
05588                                                             break;
05589                         }
05590                   }
05591             }
05592       }
05593       else
05594             usZStartIndex=0;
05595 
05596       usZLevel=usZStartLevel;
05597       usZIndex=usZStartIndex;
05598 
05599       __asm {
05600 
05601             mov         esi, SrcPtr
05602             mov         edi, DestPtr
05603             mov         edx, p16BPPPalette
05604             xor         eax, eax
05605             mov         ebx, ZPtr
05606             xor         ecx, ecx
05607 
05608             cmp         TopSkip, 0                                      // check for nothing clipped on top
05609             je          LeftSkipSetup
05610 
05611 
05612 // Skips the number of lines clipped at the top
05613 TopSkipLoop:                                                            
05614             
05615             mov         cl, [esi]
05616             inc         esi
05617             or          cl, cl
05618             js          TopSkipLoop
05619             jz          TSEndLine
05620 
05621             add         esi, ecx
05622             jmp         TopSkipLoop
05623 
05624 TSEndLine:
05625 
05626             xor         uiLineFlag, 1
05627             dec         TopSkip
05628             jnz         TopSkipLoop
05629 
05630 
05631 // Start of line loop
05632 
05633 // Skips the pixels hanging outside the left-side boundry
05634 LeftSkipSetup:
05635             
05636             mov         Unblitted, 0                              // Unblitted counts any pixels left from a run
05637             mov         eax, LeftSkip                             // after we have skipped enough left-side pixels
05638             mov         LSCount, eax                              // LSCount counts how many pixels skipped so far
05639             or          eax, eax                                        
05640             jz          BlitLineSetup                             // check for nothing to skip
05641 
05642 LeftSkipLoop:
05643 
05644             mov         cl, [esi]
05645             inc         esi
05646 
05647             or          cl, cl
05648             js          LSTrans
05649 
05650             cmp         ecx, LSCount
05651             je          LSSkip2                                               // if equal, skip whole, and start blit with new run
05652             jb          LSSkip1                                               // if less, skip whole thing
05653 
05654             add         esi, LSCount                              // skip partial run, jump into normal loop for rest
05655             sub         ecx, LSCount
05656             mov         eax, BlitLength
05657             mov         LSCount, eax
05658             mov         Unblitted, 0
05659             jmp         BlitNTL1                                        // *** jumps into non-transparent blit loop
05660             
05661 LSSkip2:
05662             add         esi, ecx                                        // skip whole run, and start blit with new run
05663             jmp         BlitLineSetup
05664 
05665 
05666 LSSkip1:
05667             add         esi, ecx                                        // skip whole run, continue skipping
05668             sub         LSCount, ecx
05669             jmp         LeftSkipLoop
05670 
05671 
05672 LSTrans:
05673             and         ecx, 07fH
05674             cmp         ecx, LSCount
05675             je          BlitLineSetup                             // if equal, skip whole, and start blit with new run
05676             jb          LSTrans1                                        // if less, skip whole thing
05677 
05678             sub         ecx, LSCount                                          // skip partial run, jump into normal loop for rest
05679             mov         eax, BlitLength
05680             mov         LSCount, eax
05681 
05682             mov         Unblitted, 0
05683             jmp         BlitTransparent                     // *** jumps into transparent blit loop
05684             
05685 
05686 LSTrans1:
05687             sub         LSCount, ecx                              // skip whole run, continue skipping
05688             jmp         LeftSkipLoop
05689 
05690 //-------------------------------------------------
05691 // setup for beginning of line
05692 
05693 BlitLineSetup:                                                    
05694             mov         eax, BlitLength
05695             mov         LSCount, eax
05696             mov         Unblitted, 0
05697 
05698 BlitDispatch:
05699 
05700             cmp         LSCount, 0                                      // Check to see if we're done blitting
05701             je          RightSkipLoop
05702 
05703             mov         cl, [esi]
05704             inc         esi
05705             or          cl, cl
05706             js          BlitTransparent
05707             jz          RSLoop2
05708             
05709 //--------------------------------
05710 // blitting non-transparent pixels
05711 
05712             and         ecx, 07fH
05713 
05714 BlitNTL1:
05715             mov         ax, [ebx]                                             // check z-level of pixel
05716             cmp         ax, usZLevel
05717             jae         BlitPixellate1
05718             jmp         BlitPixel1
05719 
05720 BlitPixellate1:
05721 
05722             // OK, DO PIXELLATE SCHEME HERE!
05723             test  uiLineFlag, 1
05724             jz          BlitSkip1
05725 
05726             test  edi, 2
05727             jz          BlitNTL2
05728             jmp         BlitPixel1
05729 
05730 BlitSkip1:
05731             test  edi, 2
05732             jnz         BlitNTL2
05733             
05734 BlitPixel1:
05735 
05736             mov         ax, usZLevel                                    // update z-level of pixel
05737             mov         [ebx], ax
05738 
05739             // Check for shadow...
05740             xor         eax, eax
05741             mov         al, [esi]
05742             cmp         al, 254
05743             jne         BlitNTL66
05744 
05745             mov         ax, [edi]
05746             mov         ax, ShadeTable[eax*2]
05747             mov         [edi], ax
05748             jmp         BlitNTL2
05749 
05750 BlitNTL66:
05751 
05752             mov         ax, [edx+eax*2]                           // Copy pixel
05753             mov         [edi], ax
05754 
05755 BlitNTL2:
05756             inc         esi
05757             add         edi, 2
05758             add         ebx, 2
05759 
05760             dec         usZColsToGo
05761             jnz         BlitNTL6
05762 
05763 // update the z-level according to the z-table
05764 
05765             push  edx         
05766             mov         edx, pZArray                                    // get pointer to array
05767             xor         eax, eax
05768             mov         ax, usZIndex                                    // pick up the current array index
05769             add         edx, eax
05770             inc         eax                                                               // increment it
05771             mov         usZIndex, ax                                    // store incremented value
05772 
05773             mov         al, [edx]                                             // get direction instruction
05774             mov         dx, usZLevel                                    // get current z-level
05775 
05776             or          al, al
05777             jz          BlitNTL5                                              // dir = 0 no change
05778             js          BlitNTL4                                              // dir < 0 z-level down
05779                                                                                                       // dir > 0 z-level up (default)
05780             add         dx, Z_SUBLAYERS
05781             jmp         BlitNTL5
05782 
05783 BlitNTL4:
