05784             sub         dx, Z_SUBLAYERS
05785 
05786 BlitNTL5:
05787             mov         usZLevel, dx                                    // store the now-modified z-level
05788             mov         usZColsToGo, 20                           // reset the next z-level change to 20 cols
05789             pop         edx
05790 
05791 BlitNTL6:
05792             dec         LSCount                                                     // decrement pixel length to blit
05793             jz          RightSkipLoop                                   // done blitting the visible line
05794             
05795             dec         ecx
05796             jnz         BlitNTL1                                              // continue current run
05797             
05798             jmp         BlitDispatch                                    // done current run, go for another
05799 
05800 
05801 //----------------------------
05802 // skipping transparent pixels
05803 
05804 BlitTransparent:                                                  // skip transparent pixels
05805 
05806             and         ecx, 07fH
05807 
05808 BlitTrans2:
05809 
05810             add         edi, 2                                                      // move up the destination pointer
05811             add         ebx, 2
05812                   
05813             dec         usZColsToGo
05814             jnz         BlitTrans1
05815 
05816 // update the z-level according to the z-table
05817 
05818             push  edx         
05819             mov         edx, pZArray                                    // get pointer to array
05820             xor         eax, eax
05821             mov         ax, usZIndex                                    // pick up the current array index
05822             add         edx, eax
05823             inc         eax                                                               // increment it
05824             mov         usZIndex, ax                                    // store incremented value
05825 
05826             mov         al, [edx]                                             // get direction instruction
05827             mov         dx, usZLevel                                    // get current z-level
05828 
05829             or          al, al
05830             jz          BlitTrans5                                      // dir = 0 no change
05831             js          BlitTrans4                                      // dir < 0 z-level down
05832                                                                                                       // dir > 0 z-level up (default)
05833             add         dx, Z_SUBLAYERS
05834             jmp         BlitTrans5
05835 
05836 BlitTrans4:
05837             sub         dx, Z_SUBLAYERS
05838 
05839 BlitTrans5:
05840             mov         usZLevel, dx                                    // store the now-modified z-level
05841             mov         usZColsToGo, 20                           // reset the next z-level change to 20 cols
05842             pop         edx
05843 
05844 BlitTrans1:
05845 
05846             dec         LSCount                                                     // decrement the pixels to blit     
05847             jz          RightSkipLoop                                   // done the line
05848 
05849             dec         ecx
05850             jnz         BlitTrans2
05851 
05852             jmp         BlitDispatch
05853 
05854 //---------------------------------------------
05855 // Scans the ETRLE until it finds an EOL marker
05856 
05857 RightSkipLoop:                                                          
05858                         
05859             
05860 RSLoop1:
05861             mov         al, [esi]
05862             inc         esi         
05863             or          al, al
05864             jnz         RSLoop1
05865 
05866 RSLoop2:
05867 
05868             xor         uiLineFlag, 1
05869             dec         BlitHeight
05870             jz          BlitDone
05871             add         edi, LineSkip
05872             add         ebx, LineSkip
05873 
05874 // reset all the z-level stuff for a new line
05875 
05876             mov         ax, usZStartLevel
05877             mov         usZLevel, ax
05878             mov         ax, usZStartIndex
05879             mov         usZIndex, ax
05880             mov         ax, usZStartCols
05881             mov         usZColsToGo, ax
05882 
05883             
05884             jmp         LeftSkipSetup
05885             
05886 
05887 BlitDone:
05888       }
05889 
05890       return(TRUE);
05891 }     
05892 
05893 
05894 
05895 
05896 void CorrectRenderCenter( INT16 sRenderX, INT16 sRenderY, INT16 *pSNewX, INT16 *pSNewY )
05897 {
05898       INT16 sScreenX, sScreenY;
05899       INT16 sNumXSteps, sNumYSteps;
05900 
05901       // Use radar scale values to get screen values, then convert ot map values, rounding to nearest middle tile
05902       sScreenX = (INT16) sRenderX;
05903       sScreenY = (INT16) sRenderY;
05904 
05905       // Adjust for offsets!
05906       sScreenX += 0;
05907       sScreenY += 10;
05908 
05909       // Adjust to viewport start!
05910       sScreenX -= ( ( gsVIEWPORT_END_X - gsVIEWPORT_START_X ) /2 );
05911       sScreenY -= ( ( gsVIEWPORT_END_Y - gsVIEWPORT_START_Y ) /2 );
05912 
05913       //Make sure these coordinates are multiples of scroll steps
05914       sNumXSteps = sScreenX  / gubNewScrollXSpeeds[ gfDoVideoScroll ][ gubCurScrollSpeedID ];
05915       sNumYSteps = sScreenY  / gubNewScrollYSpeeds[ gfDoVideoScroll ][ gubCurScrollSpeedID ];
05916 
05917 
05918       sScreenX = ( sNumXSteps * gubNewScrollXSpeeds[ gfDoVideoScroll ][ gubCurScrollSpeedID ] );
05919       sScreenY = ( sNumYSteps * gubNewScrollYSpeeds[ gfDoVideoScroll ][ gubCurScrollSpeedID ]);
05920 
05921       // Adjust back
05922       sScreenX += ( ( gsVIEWPORT_END_X - gsVIEWPORT_START_X ) /2 );
05923       sScreenY += ( ( gsVIEWPORT_END_Y - gsVIEWPORT_START_Y ) /2 );
05924 
05925       *pSNewX = sScreenX;
05926       *pSNewY = sScreenY;
05927 
05928 }
05929 
05930 
05931 
05932 // Blitter Specs
05933 // 1 ) 8 to 16 bpp
05934 // 2 ) strip z-blitter
05935 // 3 ) clipped
05936 // 4 ) trans shadow - if value is 254, makes a shadow
05937 //
05938 BOOLEAN Blt8BPPDataTo16BPPBufferTransZTransShadowIncClip( UINT16 *pBuffer, UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES, UINT16 *pZBuffer, UINT16 usZValue, HVOBJECT hSrcVObject, INT32 iX, INT32 iY, UINT16 usIndex, SGPRect *clipregion, INT16 sZIndex, UINT16 *p16BPPPalette )
05939 {
05940       UINT32 uiOffset;
05941       UINT32 usHeight, usWidth, Unblitted;
05942       UINT8  *SrcPtr, *DestPtr, *ZPtr;
05943       UINT32 LineSkip;
05944   ETRLEObject *pTrav;
05945       INT32  iTempX, iTempY, LeftSkip, RightSkip, TopSkip, BottomSkip, BlitLength, BlitHeight, LSCount;
05946       INT32  ClipX1, ClipY1, ClipX2, ClipY2;
05947       UINT16 usZLevel, usZStartLevel, usZColsToGo, usZStartIndex, usCount, usZIndex, usZStartCols;
05948       INT8 *pZArray;
05949       ZStripInfo *pZInfo;
05950 
05951       // Assertions
05952       Assert( hSrcVObject != NULL );
05953       Assert( pBuffer != NULL );
05954 
05955       // Get Offsets from Index into structure
05956       pTrav = &(hSrcVObject->pETRLEObject[ usIndex ] );
05957       usHeight                      = (UINT32)pTrav->usHeight;
05958       usWidth                             = (UINT32)pTrav->usWidth;
05959       uiOffset                      = pTrav->uiDataOffset;
05960 
05961       // Add to start position of dest buffer
05962       iTempX = iX + pTrav->sOffsetX;
05963       iTempY = iY + pTrav->sOffsetY;
05964 
05965       if(clipregion==NULL)
05966       {
05967             ClipX1=ClippingRect.iLeft;
05968             ClipY1=ClippingRect.iTop;
05969             ClipX2=ClippingRect.iRight;
05970             ClipY2=ClippingRect.iBottom;
05971       }
05972       else
05973       {
05974             ClipX1=clipregion->iLeft;
05975             ClipY1=clipregion->iTop;
05976             ClipX2=clipregion->iRight;
05977             ClipY2=clipregion->iBottom;
05978       }
05979 
05980       // Calculate rows hanging off each side of the screen
05981       LeftSkip=__min(ClipX1 - min(ClipX1, iTempX), (INT32)usWidth);
05982       RightSkip=__min(max(ClipX2, (iTempX+(INT32)usWidth)) - ClipX2, (INT32)usWidth);
05983       TopSkip=__min(ClipY1 - __min(ClipY1, iTempY), (INT32)usHeight);
05984       BottomSkip=__min(__max(ClipY2, (iTempY+(INT32)usHeight)) - ClipY2, (INT32)usHeight);
05985       
05986       // calculate the remaining rows and columns to blit
05987       BlitLength=((INT32)usWidth-LeftSkip-RightSkip);
05988       BlitHeight=((INT32)usHeight-TopSkip-BottomSkip);
05989 
05990       // check if whole thing is clipped
05991       if((LeftSkip >=(INT32)usWidth) || (RightSkip >=(INT32)usWidth))   
05992             return(TRUE);
05993 
05994       // check if whole thing is clipped
05995       if((TopSkip >=(INT32)usHeight) || (BottomSkip >=(INT32)usHeight)) 
05996             return(TRUE);
05997       
05998       SrcPtr= (UINT8 *)hSrcVObject->pPixData + uiOffset;
05999       DestPtr = (UINT8 *)pBuffer + (uiDestPitchBYTES*(iTempY+TopSkip)) + ((iTempX+LeftSkip)*2);
06000       ZPtr = (UINT8 *)pZBuffer + (uiDestPitchBYTES*(iTempY+TopSkip)) + ((iTempX+LeftSkip)*2);
06001       LineSkip=(uiDestPitchBYTES-(BlitLength*2));
06002 
06003       if(hSrcVObject->ppZStripInfo==NULL)
06004       {
06005             DebugMsg(TOPIC_VIDEOOBJECT, DBG_LEVEL_0, String("Missing Z-Strip info on multi-Z object")); 
06006             return(FALSE);
06007       }
06008       // setup for the z-column blitting stuff
06009       pZInfo=hSrcVObject->ppZStripInfo[sZIndex];
06010       if(pZInfo==NULL)
06011       {
06012             DebugMsg(TOPIC_VIDEOOBJECT, DBG_LEVEL_0, String("Missing Z-Strip info on multi-Z object")); 
06013             return(FALSE);
06014       }
06015 
06016       usZStartLevel=(UINT16)((INT16)usZValue+((INT16)pZInfo->bInitialZChange*Z_SUBLAYERS*10));
06017 
06018       if(LeftSkip > pZInfo->ubFirstZStripWidth)
06019       {
06020             usZStartCols=(LeftSkip - pZInfo->ubFirstZStripWidth);
06021             usZStartCols=20-(usZStartCols%20);
06022       }
06023       else if(LeftSkip < pZInfo->ubFirstZStripWidth)
06024             usZStartCols=(UINT16)(pZInfo->ubFirstZStripWidth - LeftSkip); 
06025       else
06026             usZStartCols=20;
06027 
06028       // set to odd number of pixels for first column
06029       usZColsToGo=usZStartCols;
06030 
06031       pZArray=pZInfo->pbZChange;
06032 
06033       if(LeftSkip >= usZColsToGo)
06034       {
06035             // Index into array after doing left clipping
06036             usZStartIndex=1 + ((LeftSkip-pZInfo->ubFirstZStripWidth)/20);
06037 
06038             //calculates the Z-value after left-side clipping
06039             if(usZStartIndex)
06040             {
06041                   for(usCount=0; usCount < usZStartIndex; usCount++)
06042                   {
06043                         switch(pZArray[usCount])
06044                         {
06045                               case -1:    usZStartLevel-=Z_SUBLAYERS;
06046                                                             break;
06047                               case 0:           //no change
06048                                                             break;
06049                               case 1:           usZStartLevel+=Z_SUBLAYERS;
06050                                                             break;
06051                         }
06052                   }
06053             }
06054       }
06055       else
06056             usZStartIndex=0;
06057 
06058       usZLevel=usZStartLevel;
06059       usZIndex=usZStartIndex;
06060 
06061       __asm {
06062 
06063             mov         esi, SrcPtr
06064             mov         edi, DestPtr
06065             mov         edx, p16BPPPalette
06066             xor         eax, eax
06067             mov         ebx, ZPtr
06068             xor         ecx, ecx
06069 
06070             cmp         TopSkip, 0                                      // check for nothing clipped on top
06071             je          LeftSkipSetup
06072 
06073 
06074 // Skips the number of lines clipped at the top
06075 TopSkipLoop:                                                            
06076             
06077             mov         cl, [esi]
06078             inc         esi
06079             or          cl, cl
06080             js          TopSkipLoop
06081             jz          TSEndLine
06082 
06083             add         esi, ecx
06084             jmp         TopSkipLoop
06085 
06086 TSEndLine:
06087             dec         TopSkip
06088             jnz         TopSkipLoop
06089 
06090 
06091 // Start of line loop
06092 
06093 // Skips the pixels hanging outside the left-side boundry
06094 LeftSkipSetup:
06095             
06096             mov         Unblitted, 0                              // Unblitted counts any pixels left from a run
06097             mov         eax, LeftSkip                             // after we have skipped enough left-side pixels
06098             mov         LSCount, eax                              // LSCount counts how many pixels skipped so far
06099             or          eax, eax                                        
06100             jz          BlitLineSetup                             // check for nothing to skip
06101 
06102 LeftSkipLoop:
06103 
06104             mov         cl, [esi]
06105             inc         esi
06106 
06107             or          cl, cl
06108             js          LSTrans
06109 
06110             cmp         ecx, LSCount
06111             je          LSSkip2                                               // if equal, skip whole, and start blit with new run
06112             jb          LSSkip1                                               // if less, skip whole thing
06113 
06114             add         esi, LSCount                              // skip partial run, jump into normal loop for rest
06115             sub         ecx, LSCount
06116             mov         eax, BlitLength
06117             mov         LSCount, eax
06118             mov         Unblitted, 0
06119             jmp         BlitNTL1                                        // *** jumps into non-transparent blit loop
06120             
06121 LSSkip2:
06122             add         esi, ecx                                        // skip whole run, and start blit with new run
06123             jmp         BlitLineSetup
06124 
06125 
06126 LSSkip1:
06127             add         esi, ecx                                        // skip whole run, continue skipping
06128             sub         LSCount, ecx
06129             jmp         LeftSkipLoop
06130 
06131 
06132 LSTrans:
06133             and         ecx, 07fH
06134             cmp         ecx, LSCount
06135             je          BlitLineSetup                             // if equal, skip whole, and start blit with new run
06136             jb          LSTrans1                                        // if less, skip whole thing
06137 
06138             sub         ecx, LSCount                                          // skip partial run, jump into normal loop for rest
06139             mov         eax, BlitLength
06140             mov         LSCount, eax
06141 
06142             mov         Unblitted, 0
06143             jmp         BlitTransparent                     // *** jumps into transparent blit loop
06144             
06145 
06146 LSTrans1:
06147             sub         LSCount, ecx                              // skip whole run, continue skipping
06148             jmp         LeftSkipLoop
06149 
06150 //-------------------------------------------------
06151 // setup for beginning of line
06152 
06153 BlitLineSetup:                                                    
06154             mov         eax, BlitLength
06155             mov         LSCount, eax
06156             mov         Unblitted, 0
06157 
06158 BlitDispatch:
06159 
06160             cmp         LSCount, 0                                      // Check to see if we're done blitting
06161             je          RightSkipLoop
06162 
06163             mov         cl, [esi]
06164             inc         esi
06165             or          cl, cl
06166             js          BlitTransparent
06167             jz          RSLoop2
06168             
06169 //--------------------------------
06170 // blitting non-transparent pixels
06171 
06172             and         ecx, 07fH
06173 
06174 BlitNTL1:
06175             mov         ax, [ebx]                                             // check z-level of pixel
06176             cmp         ax, usZLevel
06177             ja          BlitNTL2
06178 
06179             mov         ax, usZLevel                                    // update z-level of pixel
06180             mov         [ebx], ax
06181 
06182             // Check for shadow...
06183             xor         eax, eax
06184             mov         al, [esi]
06185             cmp         al, 254
06186             jne         BlitNTL66
06187 
06188             mov         ax, [edi]
06189             mov         ax, ShadeTable[eax*2]
06190             mov         [edi], ax
06191             jmp         BlitNTL2
06192 
06193 BlitNTL66:
06194 
06195             mov         ax, [edx+eax*2]                           // Copy pixel
06196             mov         [edi], ax
06197 
06198 BlitNTL2:
06199             inc         esi
06200             add         edi, 2
06201             add         ebx, 2
06202 
06203             dec         usZColsToGo
06204             jnz         BlitNTL6
06205 
06206 // update the z-level according to the z-table
06207 
06208             push  edx         
06209             mov         edx, pZArray                                    // get pointer to array
06210             xor         eax, eax
06211             mov         ax, usZIndex                                    // pick up the current array index
06212             add         edx, eax
06213             inc         eax                                                               // increment it
06214             mov         usZIndex, ax                                    // store incremented value
06215 
06216             mov         al, [edx]                                             // get direction instruction
06217             mov         dx, usZLevel                                    // get current z-level
06218 
06219             or          al, al
06220             jz          BlitNTL5                                              // dir = 0 no change
06221             js          BlitNTL4                                              // dir < 0 z-level down
06222                                                                                                       // dir > 0 z-level up (default)
06223             add         dx, Z_SUBLAYERS
06224             jmp         BlitNTL5
06225 
06226 BlitNTL4:
06227             sub         dx, Z_SUBLAYERS
06228 
06229 BlitNTL5:
06230             mov         usZLevel, dx                                    // store the now-modified z-level
06231             mov         usZColsToGo, 20                           // reset the next z-level change to 20 cols
06232             pop         edx
06233 
06234 BlitNTL6:
06235             dec         LSCount                                                     // decrement pixel length to blit
06236             jz          RightSkipLoop                                   // done blitting the visible line
06237             
06238             dec         ecx
06239             jnz         BlitNTL1                                              // continue current run
06240             
06241             jmp         BlitDispatch                                    // done current run, go for another
06242 
06243 
06244 //----------------------------
06245 // skipping transparent pixels
06246 
06247 BlitTransparent:                                                  // skip transparent pixels
06248 
06249             and         ecx, 07fH
06250 
06251 BlitTrans2:
06252 
06253             add         edi, 2                                                      // move up the destination pointer
06254             add         ebx, 2
06255                   
06256             dec         usZColsToGo
06257             jnz         BlitTrans1
06258 
06259 // update the z-level according to the z-table
06260 
06261             push  edx         
06262             mov         edx, pZArray                                    // get pointer to array
06263             xor         eax, eax
06264             mov         ax, usZIndex                                    // pick up the current array index
06265             add         edx, eax
06266             inc         eax                                                               // increment it
06267             mov         usZIndex, ax                                    // store incremented value
06268 
06269             mov         al, [edx]                                             // get direction instruction
06270             mov         dx, usZLevel                                    // get current z-level
06271 
06272             or          al, al
06273             jz          BlitTrans5                                      // dir = 0 no change
06274             js          BlitTrans4                                      // dir < 0 z-level down
06275                                                                                                       // dir > 0 z-level up (default)
06276             add         dx, Z_SUBLAYERS
06277             jmp         BlitTrans5
06278 
06279 BlitTrans4:
06280             sub         dx, Z_SUBLAYERS
06281 
06282 BlitTrans5:
06283             mov         usZLevel, dx                                    // store the now-modified z-level
06284             mov         usZColsToGo, 20                           // reset the next z-level change to 20 cols
06285             pop         edx
06286 
06287 BlitTrans1:
06288 
06289             dec         LSCount                                                     // decrement the pixels to blit     
06290             jz          RightSkipLoop                                   // done the line
06291 
06292             dec         ecx
06293             jnz         BlitTrans2
06294 
06295             jmp         BlitDispatch
06296 
06297 //---------------------------------------------
06298 // Scans the ETRLE until it finds an EOL marker
06299 
06300 RightSkipLoop:                                                          
06301                         
06302             
06303 RSLoop1:
06304             mov         al, [esi]
06305             inc         esi         
06306             or          al, al
06307             jnz         RSLoop1
06308 
06309 RSLoop2:
06310 
06311             dec         BlitHeight
06312             jz          BlitDone
06313             add         edi, LineSkip
06314             add         ebx, LineSkip
06315 
06316 // reset all the z-level stuff for a new line
06317 
06318             mov         ax, usZStartLevel
06319             mov         usZLevel, ax
06320             mov         ax, usZStartIndex
06321             mov         usZIndex, ax
06322             mov         ax, usZStartCols
06323             mov         usZColsToGo, ax
06324 
06325             
06326             jmp         LeftSkipSetup
06327             
06328 
06329 BlitDone:
06330       }
06331 
06332       return(TRUE);
06333 }

06338 void RenderRoomInfo( INT16 sStartPointX_M, INT16 sStartPointY_M, INT16 sStartPointX_S, INT16 sStartPointY_S, INT16 sEndXS, INT16 sEndYS )
06339 {
06340       INT8                    bXOddFlag = 0;
06341       INT16                   sAnchorPosX_M, sAnchorPosY_M;
06342       INT16                   sAnchorPosX_S, sAnchorPosY_S;
06343       INT16                   sTempPosX_M, sTempPosY_M;
06344       INT16                   sTempPosX_S, sTempPosY_S;
06345       BOOLEAN                 fEndRenderRow = FALSE, fEndRenderCol = FALSE;
06346       UINT16                  usTileIndex;
06347       INT16                   sX, sY;
06348       UINT32                  uiDestPitchBYTES;
06349       UINT8                   *pDestBuf;
06350 
06351 
06352       // Begin Render Loop
06353       sAnchorPosX_M = sStartPointX_M;
06354       sAnchorPosY_M = sStartPointY_M;
06355       sAnchorPosX_S = sStartPointX_S;
06356       sAnchorPosY_S = sStartPointY_S;
06357 
06358       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );
06359 
06360       do
06361       {
06362 
06363             fEndRenderRow = FALSE;
06364             sTempPosX_M = sAnchorPosX_M;
06365             sTempPosY_M = sAnchorPosY_M;
06366             sTempPosX_S = sAnchorPosX_S;
06367             sTempPosY_S = sAnchorPosY_S;
06368 
06369             if(bXOddFlag > 0)
06370                   sTempPosX_S += 20;
06371 
06372 
06373             do
06374             {
06375 
06376                   usTileIndex=FASTMAPROWCOLTOPOS( sTempPosY_M, sTempPosX_M );
06377 
06378                   if ( usTileIndex < GRIDSIZE   )
06379                   {
06380                         sX = sTempPosX_S + ( WORLD_TILE_X / 2 ) - 5;
06381                         sY = sTempPosY_S + ( WORLD_TILE_Y / 2 ) - 5;
06382 
06383                         // THIS ROOM STUFF IS ONLY DONE IN THE EDITOR...
06384                         // ADJUST BY SHEIGHT
06385                         sY -= gpWorldLevelData[ usTileIndex ].sHeight;
06386                         //sY += gsRenderHeight;
06387 
06388                         if ( gubWorldRoomInfo[ usTileIndex ] != NO_ROOM )
06389                         {
06390                               SetFont( SMALLCOMPFONT );
06391                               SetFontDestBuffer( FRAME_BUFFER , 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, gsVIEWPORT_END_Y, FALSE );
06392                               switch( gubWorldRoomInfo[ usTileIndex ] % 5 )
06393                               {
06394                                     case 0:           SetFontForeground( FONT_GRAY3 );    break;
06395                                     case 1:           SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );   break;
06396                                     case 2:           SetFontForeground( FONT_LTRED );    break;
06397                                     case 3:           SetFontForeground( FONT_LTBLUE );   break;
06398                                     case 4:   SetFontForeground( FONT_LTGREEN );break;
06399                               }
06400                               mprintf_buffer( pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, TINYFONT1, sX,  sY , L"%d", gubWorldRoomInfo[ usTileIndex ] );
06401                               SetFontDestBuffer( FRAME_BUFFER , 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, FALSE );
06402                         }
06403                   }
06404                   
06405                   sTempPosX_S += 40;
06406                   sTempPosX_M ++;
06407                   sTempPosY_M --;
06408 
06409                   if ( sTempPosX_S >= sEndXS )
06410                   {
06411                         fEndRenderRow = TRUE;                                       
06412                   }
06413 
06414             } while( !fEndRenderRow );
06415 
06416             if ( bXOddFlag > 0 )
06417             {
06418                   sAnchorPosY_M ++;
06419             }
06420             else
06421             {
06422                   sAnchorPosX_M ++;
06423             }
06424             
06425 
06426             bXOddFlag = !bXOddFlag;
06427             sAnchorPosY_S += 10;
06428 
06429             if ( sAnchorPosY_S >= sEndYS )
06430             {
06431                   fEndRenderCol = TRUE;
06432             }
06433 
06434       }
06435       while( !fEndRenderCol );
06436 
06437       UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
06438 
06439 }

06774 
06775 void ExamineZBufferForHiddenTiles( INT16 sStartPointX_M, INT16 sStartPointY_M, INT16 sStartPointX_S, INT16 sStartPointY_S, INT16 sEndXS, INT16 sEndYS )
06776 {
06777       INT8                    bXOddFlag = 0;
06778       INT16                   sAnchorPosX_M, sAnchorPosY_M;
06779       INT16                   sAnchorPosX_S, sAnchorPosY_S;
06780       INT16                   sTempPosX_M, sTempPosY_M;
06781       INT16                   sTempPosX_S, sTempPosY_S;
06782       BOOLEAN                 fEndRenderRow = FALSE, fEndRenderCol = FALSE;
06783       UINT16                  usTileIndex;
06784       INT16                   sX, sY, sWorldX, sZLevel;
06785       UINT32                  uiDestPitchBYTES;
06786       UINT8                   *pDestBuf;
06787       TILE_ELEMENT *TileElem;
06788       INT8              bBlitClipVal;
06789       LEVELNODE         *pObject;
06790 
06791 
06792       // Begin Render Loop
06793       sAnchorPosX_M = sStartPointX_M;
06794       sAnchorPosY_M = sStartPointY_M;
06795       sAnchorPosX_S = sStartPointX_S;
06796       sAnchorPosY_S = sStartPointY_S;
06797 
06798       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );
06799 
06800       // Get VObject for firt land peice!
06801       TileElem = &(gTileDatabase[ FIRSTTEXTURE1 ] );
06802 
06803 
06804       do
06805       {
06806 
06807             fEndRenderRow = FALSE;
06808             sTempPosX_M = sAnchorPosX_M;
06809             sTempPosY_M = sAnchorPosY_M;
06810             sTempPosX_S = sAnchorPosX_S;
06811             sTempPosY_S = sAnchorPosY_S;
06812 
06813             if(bXOddFlag > 0)
06814                   sTempPosX_S += 20;
06815 
06816 
06817             do
06818             {
06819 
06820                   usTileIndex=FASTMAPROWCOLTOPOS( sTempPosY_M, sTempPosX_M );
06821 
06822                   if ( usTileIndex < GRIDSIZE   )
06823                   {
06824                         // ATE: Don;t let any vehicle sit here....
06825                         if ( FindStructure( usTileIndex, ( STRUCTURE_MOBILE ) ) )
06826                         {
06827                               // Continue...
06828                               goto ENDOFLOOP;
06829                         }
06830 
06831                         sX = sTempPosX_S;
06832                         sY = sTempPosY_S - gpWorldLevelData[usTileIndex].sHeight;
06833 
06834                         // Adjust for interface level
06835                         sY += gsRenderHeight;
06836 
06837                         // Caluluate zvalue
06838                         // Look for anything less than struct layer!
06839                         GetWorldXYAbsoluteScreenXY( sTempPosX_M, sTempPosY_M, &sWorldX, &sZLevel);
06840 
06841                         sZLevel += gsRenderHeight;
06842                         
06843                         sZLevel=(sZLevel*Z_SUBLAYERS)+STRUCT_Z_LEVEL;
06844 
06845                         if ( gpWorldLevelData[usTileIndex].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REEVALUATE_REDUNDENCY )
06846                         {
06847                               bBlitClipVal = BltIsClippedOrOffScreen(TileElem->hTileSurface, sX, sY, TileElem->usRegionIndex, &gClippingRect);
06848 
06849                               if ( bBlitClipVal == FALSE )
06850                               {
06851                                     // Set flag to not evaluate again!
06852                                     gpWorldLevelData[usTileIndex].uiFlags &= (~MAPELEMENT_REEVALUATE_REDUNDENCY );
06853 
06854                                     // OK, first do some rules with exceptions
06855                                     // Don't let this happen for roads!
06856                                     pObject = gpWorldLevelData[usTileIndex ].pObjectHead;
06857 
06858                                     if ( IsTileRedundent( gpZBuffer, sZLevel, TileElem->hTileSurface, sX, sY, TileElem->usRegionIndex ) )
06859                                     {
06860                                           // Mark in the world!
06861                                           gpWorldLevelData[ usTileIndex ].uiFlags |= MAPELEMENT_REDUNDENT;
06862                                     }
06863                                     else
06864                                     {
06865                                           // Un Mark in the world!
06866                                           gpWorldLevelData[ usTileIndex ].uiFlags &= (~MAPELEMENT_REDUNDENT);
06867                                     }
06868 
06869                               } 
06870                         }
06871                   }
06872 
06873 ENDOFLOOP:
06874                   
06875                   sTempPosX_S += 40;
06876                   sTempPosX_M ++;
06877                   sTempPosY_M --;
06878 
06879                   if ( sTempPosX_S >= sEndXS )
06880                   {
06881                         fEndRenderRow = TRUE;                                       
06882                   }
06883 
06884             } while( !fEndRenderRow );
06885 
06886             if ( bXOddFlag > 0 )
06887             {
06888                   sAnchorPosY_M ++;
06889             }
06890             else
06891             {
06892                   sAnchorPosX_M ++;
06893             }
06894             
06895 
06896             bXOddFlag = !bXOddFlag;
06897             sAnchorPosY_S += 10;
06898 
06899             if ( sAnchorPosY_S >= sEndYS )
06900             {
06901                   fEndRenderCol = TRUE;
06902             }
06903 
06904       }
06905       while( !fEndRenderCol );
06906 
06907       UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
06908 
06909 }
06910 
06911 
06912 
06913 void CalcRenderParameters(INT16 sLeft, INT16 sTop, INT16 sRight, INT16 sBottom )
06914 {
06915       INT16 sTempPosX_W, sTempPosY_W;
06916       INT16 sRenderCenterX_W, sRenderCenterY_W;
06917       INT16 sOffsetX_W, sOffsetY_W, sOffsetX_S, sOffsetY_S;
06918 
06919       gOldClipRect = gClippingRect;
06920 
06921       // Set new clipped rect
06922       gClippingRect.iLeft = __max( gsVIEWPORT_START_X, sLeft);
06923       gClippingRect.iRight = __min( gsVIEWPORT_END_X, sRight);
06924       gClippingRect.iTop = __max( gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y, sTop);
06925       gClippingRect.iBottom = __min(gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_END_Y, sBottom);
06926 
06927       gsEndXS = sRight + VIEWPORT_XOFFSET_S;
06928       gsEndYS = sBottom + VIEWPORT_YOFFSET_S;
06929 
06930       sRenderCenterX_W = gsRenderCenterX;
06931       sRenderCenterY_W = gsRenderCenterY;
06932 
06933       // STEP THREE - determine starting point in world coords
06934       // a) Determine where in screen coords to start rendering
06935       gsStartPointX_S = ( ( gsVIEWPORT_END_X - gsVIEWPORT_START_X ) /2 ) - (sLeft - VIEWPORT_XOFFSET_S);
06936       gsStartPointY_S = ( ( gsVIEWPORT_END_Y - gsVIEWPORT_START_Y ) /2 ) - (sTop - VIEWPORT_YOFFSET_S);
06937 
06938 
06939       // b) Convert these distances into world distances
06940       FromScreenToCellCoordinates( gsStartPointX_S, gsStartPointY_S, &sTempPosX_W, &sTempPosY_W );
06941 
06942       // c) World start point is Render center minus this distance
06943       gsStartPointX_W = sRenderCenterX_W - sTempPosX_W;
06944       gsStartPointY_W = sRenderCenterY_W - sTempPosY_W;
06945 
06946       // NOTE: Increase X map value by 1 tile to offset where on screen we are...
06947       if ( gsStartPointX_W > 0 )
06948             gsStartPointX_W += CELL_X_SIZE;
06949 
06950       // d) screen start point is screen distances minus screen center
06951       gsStartPointX_S = sLeft - VIEWPORT_XOFFSET_S;
06952       gsStartPointY_S = sTop - VIEWPORT_YOFFSET_S;
06953 
06954       // STEP FOUR - Determine Start block
06955       // a) Find start block
06956       gsStartPointX_M = ( gsStartPointX_W  ) / CELL_X_SIZE;
06957       gsStartPointY_M = ( gsStartPointY_W  ) / CELL_Y_SIZE;
06958 
06959       // STEP 5 - Determine Deltas for center and find screen values
06960       //Make sure these coordinates are multiples of scroll steps
06961       sOffsetX_W = abs( gsStartPointX_W ) - ( abs( ( gsStartPointX_M * CELL_X_SIZE ) ) );
06962       sOffsetY_W = abs( gsStartPointY_W ) - ( abs( ( gsStartPointY_M * CELL_Y_SIZE ) ) );
06963 
06964       FromCellToScreenCoordinates( sOffsetX_W, sOffsetY_W, &sOffsetX_S, &sOffsetY_S );
06965 
06966       if ( gsStartPointY_W < 0 )
06967       {
06968             gsStartPointY_S   += 0;//(sOffsetY_S/2); 
06969       }
06970       else
06971       {
06972             gsStartPointY_S   -= sOffsetY_S; 
06973       }
06974       gsStartPointX_S   -= sOffsetX_S; 
06975 
06976 
06977       // Set globals for render offset
06978       if ( gsRenderWorldOffsetX == -1 )
06979       {
06980             gsRenderWorldOffsetX = sOffsetX_S;
06981       }
06982 
06983       if ( gsRenderWorldOffsetY == -1 )
06984       {
06985             gsRenderWorldOffsetY = sOffsetY_S;
06986       }
06987 
06988       /////////////////////////////////////////
06989       //ATE: CALCULATE LARGER OFFSET VALUES
06990       gsLEndXS = sRight + LARGER_VIEWPORT_XOFFSET_S;
06991       gsLEndYS = sBottom + LARGER_VIEWPORT_YOFFSET_S;
06992 
06993             // STEP THREE - determine starting point in world coords
06994       // a) Determine where in screen coords to start rendering
06995       gsLStartPointX_S = ( ( gsVIEWPORT_END_X - gsVIEWPORT_START_X ) /2 ) - (sLeft - LARGER_VIEWPORT_XOFFSET_S);
06996       gsLStartPointY_S = ( ( gsVIEWPORT_END_Y - gsVIEWPORT_START_Y ) /2 ) - (sTop - LARGER_VIEWPORT_YOFFSET_S);
06997 
06998 
06999       // b) Convert these distances into world distances
07000       FromScreenToCellCoordinates( gsLStartPointX_S, gsLStartPointY_S, &sTempPosX_W, &sTempPosY_W );
07001 
07002       // c) World start point is Render center minus this distance
07003       gsLStartPointX_W = sRenderCenterX_W - sTempPosX_W;
07004       gsLStartPointY_W = sRenderCenterY_W - sTempPosY_W;
07005 
07006       // NOTE: Increase X map value by 1 tile to offset where on screen we are...
07007       if ( gsLStartPointX_W > 0 )
07008             gsLStartPointX_W += CELL_X_SIZE;
07009 
07010       // d) screen start point is screen distances minus screen center
07011       gsLStartPointX_S = sLeft - LARGER_VIEWPORT_XOFFSET_S;
07012       gsLStartPointY_S = sTop - LARGER_VIEWPORT_YOFFSET_S;
07013 
07014       // STEP FOUR - Determine Start block
07015       // a) Find start block
07016       gsLStartPointX_M = ( gsLStartPointX_W  ) / CELL_X_SIZE;
07017       gsLStartPointY_M = ( gsLStartPointY_W  ) / CELL_Y_SIZE;
07018 
07019       // Adjust starting screen coordinates
07020       gsLStartPointX_S  -= sOffsetX_S; 
07021 
07022       if ( gsLStartPointY_W < 0 )
07023       {
07024             gsLStartPointY_S  += 0; 
07025             gsLStartPointX_S  -= 20; 
07026       }
07027       else
07028       {
07029             gsLStartPointY_S  -= sOffsetY_S; 
07030       }
07031 
07032 }

07043 BOOLEAN Zero8BPPDataTo16BPPBufferTransparent( UINT16 *pBuffer, UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES, HVOBJECT hSrcVObject, INT32 iX, INT32 iY, UINT16 usIndex )
07044 {
07045       UINT32 uiOffset;
07046       UINT32 usHeight, usWidth;
07047       UINT8  *SrcPtr, *DestPtr;
07048       UINT32 LineSkip;
07049       ETRLEObject *pTrav;
07050       INT32  iTempX, iTempY;
07051 
07052   
07053       // Assertions
07054       Assert( hSrcVObject != NULL );
07055       Assert( pBuffer != NULL );
07056 
07057       // Get Offsets from Index into structure
07058       pTrav = &(hSrcVObject->pETRLEObject[ usIndex ] );
07059       usHeight                      = (UINT32)pTrav->usHeight;
07060       usWidth                             = (UINT32)pTrav->usWidth;
07061       uiOffset                      = pTrav->uiDataOffset;
07062 
07063       // Add to start position of dest buffer
07064       iTempX = iX + pTrav->sOffsetX;
07065       iTempY = iY + pTrav->sOffsetY;
07066 
07067       // Validations
07068       CHECKF( iTempX >= 0 );
07069       CHECKF( iTempY >= 0 );
07070 
07071 
07072       SrcPtr= (UINT8 *)hSrcVObject->pPixData + uiOffset;
07073       DestPtr = (UINT8 *)pBuffer + (uiDestPitchBYTES*iTempY) + (iTempX*2);
07074       LineSkip=(uiDestPitchBYTES-(usWidth*2));
07075 
07076       __asm {
07077 
07078             mov         esi, SrcPtr
07079             mov         edi, DestPtr
07080             xor         eax, eax
07081             xor         ebx, ebx
07082             xor         ecx, ecx
07083 
07084 BlitDispatch:
07085 
07086             mov         cl, [esi]
07087             inc         esi
07088             or          cl, cl
07089             js          BlitTransparent
07090             jz          BlitDoneLine
07091 
07092 //BlitNonTransLoop:
07093 
07094             clc
07095             rcr         cl, 1
07096             jnc         BlitNTL2
07097 
07098             mov         [edi], ax
07099             
07100             inc         esi
07101             add         edi, 2
07102 
07103 BlitNTL2:
07104             clc
07105             rcr         cl, 1
07106             jnc         BlitNTL3
07107 
07108             mov         [edi], ax
07109 
07110             mov         [edi+2], ax
07111 
07112             add         esi, 2
07113             add         edi, 4
07114 
07115 BlitNTL3:
07116 
07117             or          cl, cl
07118             jz          BlitDispatch
07119 
07120             xor         ebx, ebx
07121 
07122 BlitNTL4:
07123             
07124             mov         [edi], ax
07125 
07126             mov         [edi+2], ax
07127 
07128             mov         [edi+4], ax
07129 
07130             mov         [edi+6], ax
07131 
07132             add         esi, 4
07133             add         edi, 8
07134             dec         cl
07135             jnz         BlitNTL4
07136 
07137             jmp         BlitDispatch
07138 
07139 BlitTransparent:
07140 
07141             and         ecx, 07fH
07142 //          shl         ecx, 1
07143             add   ecx, ecx
07144             add         edi, ecx
07145             jmp         BlitDispatch
07146 
07147 
07148 BlitDoneLine:
07149                         
07150             dec         usHeight
07151             jz          BlitDone
07152             add         edi, LineSkip
07153             jmp         BlitDispatch
07154             
07155 
07156 BlitDone:
07157       }
07158 
07159       return(TRUE);
07160 
07161 }

07164 BOOLEAN Blt8BPPDataTo16BPPBufferTransInvZ( UINT16 *pBuffer, UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES, UINT16 *pZBuffer, UINT16 usZValue, HVOBJECT hSrcVObject, INT32 iX, INT32 iY, UINT16 usIndex )
07165 {
07166       UINT16 *p16BPPPalette;
07167       UINT32 uiOffset;
07168       UINT32 usHeight, usWidth;
07169       UINT8  *SrcPtr, *DestPtr, *ZPtr;
07170       UINT32 LineSkip;

07176       Assert( hSrcVObject != NULL );
07177       Assert( pBuffer != NULL );

07180       pTrav = &(hSrcVObject->pETRLEObject[ usIndex ] );

07182       usWidth                             = (UINT32)pTrav->usWidth;

07184 
07185       // Add to start position of dest buffer
07186       iTempX = iX + pTrav->sOffsetX;
07187       iTempY = iY + pTrav->sOffsetY;
07188 
07189       // Validations
07190       CHECKF( iTempX >= 0 );
07191       CHECKF( iTempY >= 0 );
07192 
07193 
07194       SrcPtr= (UINT8 *)hSrcVObject->pPixData + uiOffset;
07195       DestPtr = (UINT8 *)pBuffer + (uiDestPitchBYTES*iTempY) + (iTempX*2);
07196       ZPtr = (UINT8 *)pZBuffer + (uiDestPitchBYTES*iTempY) + (iTempX*2);
07197       p16BPPPalette = hSrcVObject->pShadeCurrent;
07198       LineSkip=(uiDestPitchBYTES-(usWidth*2));
07199 
07200       __asm {
07201 
07202             mov         esi, SrcPtr
07203             mov         edi, DestPtr
07204             mov         edx, p16BPPPalette
07205             xor         eax, eax
07206             mov         ebx, ZPtr
07207             xor         ecx, ecx
07208 
07209 BlitDispatch:
07210 
07211             mov         cl, [esi]
07212             inc         esi
07213             or          cl, cl
07214             js          BlitTransparent
07215             jz          BlitDoneLine
07216 
07217 //BlitNonTransLoop:
07218 
07219             xor         eax, eax
07220 
07221 BlitNTL4:
07222             
07223             mov         ax, usZValue            
07224             cmp         ax, [ebx]
07225             jne         BlitNTL5
07226 
07227             //mov       [ebx], ax
07228             
07229             xor         ah, ah
07230             mov         al, [esi]
07231             mov         ax, [edx+eax*2]
07232             mov         [edi], ax
07233             
07234 BlitNTL5:
07235             inc         esi
07236             inc         edi
07237             inc         ebx
07238             inc         edi
07239             inc         ebx
07240 
07241             dec         cl
07242             jnz         BlitNTL4
07243 
07244             jmp         BlitDispatch
07245 
07246 
07247 BlitTransparent:
07248 
07249             and         ecx, 07fH
07250 //          shl         ecx, 1
07251             add   ecx, ecx
07252             add         edi, ecx
07253             add         ebx, ecx
07254             jmp         BlitDispatch
07255 
07256 
07257 BlitDoneLine:
07258                         
07259             dec         usHeight
07260             jz          BlitDone
07261             add         edi, LineSkip
07262             add         ebx, LineSkip
07263             jmp         BlitDispatch
07264             
07265 
07266 BlitDone:
07267       }
07268 
07269       return(TRUE);
07270 
07271 }

07275 BOOLEAN IsTileRedundent( UINT16 *pZBuffer, UINT16 usZValue, HVOBJECT hSrcVObject, INT32 iX, INT32 iY, UINT16 usIndex )
07276 {
07277       UINT16 *p16BPPPalette;
07278       UINT32 uiOffset;
07279       UINT32 usHeight, usWidth;
07280       UINT8  *SrcPtr, *ZPtr;
07281       UINT32 LineSkip;
07282       ETRLEObject *pTrav;
07283       INT32  iTempX, iTempY;
07284       BOOLEAN           fHidden = TRUE;
07285 
07286   
07287       // Assertions
07288       Assert( hSrcVObject != NULL );
07289 
07290       // Get Offsets from Index into structure
07291       pTrav = &(hSrcVObject->pETRLEObject[ usIndex ] );
07292       usHeight                      = (UINT32)pTrav->usHeight;
07293       usWidth                             = (UINT32)pTrav->usWidth;
07294       uiOffset                      = pTrav->uiDataOffset;
07295 
07296       // Add to start position of dest buffer
07297       iTempX = iX + pTrav->sOffsetX;
07298       iTempY = iY + pTrav->sOffsetY;
07299 
07300       // Validations
07301       CHECKF( iTempX >= 0 );
07302       CHECKF( iTempY >= 0 );
07303 
07304 
07305       SrcPtr= (UINT8 *)hSrcVObject->pPixData + uiOffset;
07306       ZPtr = (UINT8 *)pZBuffer + (2280*iTempY) + (iTempX*2);
07307       p16BPPPalette = hSrcVObject->pShadeCurrent;
07308       LineSkip=(2280-(usWidth*2));
07309 
07310       __asm {
07311 
07312             mov         esi, SrcPtr
07313             mov         edx, p16BPPPalette
07314             xor         eax, eax
07315             mov         ebx, ZPtr
07316             xor         ecx, ecx
07317 
07318 BlitDispatch:
07319 
07320             mov         cl, [esi]
07321             inc         esi
07322             or          cl, cl
07323             js          BlitTransparent
07324             jz          BlitDoneLine
07325 
07326 //BlitNonTransLoop:
07327 
07328             xor         eax, eax
07329 
07330 BlitNTL4:
07331             
07332             mov         ax, usZValue            
07333             cmp         ax, [ebx]
07334             jle         BlitNTL5
07335 
07336 
07337             //    Set false, flag
07338             mov   fHidden, 0
07339             jmp         BlitDone
07340 
07341                   
07342 BlitNTL5:
07343             inc         esi
07344             inc         ebx
07345             inc         ebx
07346 
07347             dec         cl
07348             jnz         BlitNTL4
07349 
07350             jmp         BlitDispatch
07351 
07352 
07353 BlitTransparent:
07354 
07355             and         ecx, 07fH
07356 //          shl         ecx, 1
07357             add   ecx, ecx
07358             add         ebx, ecx
07359             jmp         BlitDispatch
07360 
07361 
07362 BlitDoneLine:
07363                         
07364             dec         usHeight
07365             jz          BlitDone
07366             add         ebx, LineSkip
07367             jmp         BlitDispatch
07368             
07369 
07370 BlitDone:
07371       }
07372 
07373       return(fHidden);
07374 
07375 }

07418 void SetRenderCenter( INT16 sNewX, INT16 sNewY )
07419 {
07420       if ( gfIgnoreScrolling == 1 )
07421       {
07422             return;
07423       }
07424 
07425       // Apply these new coordinates to the renderer!
07426       ApplyScrolling( sNewX, sNewY, TRUE , FALSE );
07427 
07428       // Set flag to ignore scrolling this frame
07429       gfIgnoreScrollDueToCenterAdjust = TRUE;
07430 
07431       // Set full render flag!
07432       // DIRTY THE WORLD!
07433       SetRenderFlags(RENDER_FLAG_FULL);
07434 
07435       gfPlotNewMovement = TRUE;
07436 
07437       if ( gfScrollPending == TRUE )
07438       {
07439             // Do a complete rebuild!
07440             gfScrollPending = FALSE;
07441 
07442             // Restore Interface!
07443             RestoreInterface( );
07444 
07445             // Delete Topmost blitters saved areas
07446             DeleteVideoOverlaysArea( );
07447 
07448       }
07449 
07450       gfScrollInertia = FALSE;
07451 
07452 }
